NK015(ba)004:0: ring 'tsho'i cho ga sgrub pa'i rnam par bzhag pa
NK015(ba)004:1: 'chi bdag slu ba'i rtog pa'i don 'grel tshe dbang
NK015(ba)004:2: dga' ba 'khyil ba'i thig le zhes bya ba bzhugs
NK015(ba)004:3: so // a m+aa ra ni dz+ai ban+tu /
NK015(ba)004:4: rab mdzes zla ba zhun ma'i thig le ni /
NK015(ba)004:6: / 'chi med bdud rtsi'i bsil zer 'dzag pa yis //
NK015(ba)004:7: dus kyi mun pa bsnyil nas rtag brtan gyi //
NK015(ba)004:8: lang tsho rgyas mdzad lhag pa'i lha des skyongs //
NK015(ba)004:9: mtho ris rten bzang lha yi dga' 'tshal na //
NK015(ba)004:10: tshe mchog dpal gyi 'dab ma yid 'ong ba //
NK015(ba)004:11: sde bzhi'i snye ma'i phud bus dud pa der //
NK015(ba)004:12: thar pa'i longs spyod dbyar gyi sman ljongs bzhin //
NK015(ba)004:13: de bas na brjod bya dang dgos sogs kyi 'brel
NK015(ba)004:14: pa dang ldan pa 'di 'chad pa la spyi don
NK015(ba)004:15: rnam pa bcu gsum gyis bstan te /
NK015(ba)004:23: rgyud sgrub thabs kyi mdor bstan /
NK015(ba)004:28: tshe grub pa'i 'bras bu bstan pa'o //
NK015(ba)004:31: srog ni tshe yin drod dang ni //
NK015(ba)004:32: rnam shes rten gang yin pa'o //
NK015(ba)004:33: zhes drod dang rnam shes rgyun chags su gnas pa'i rten nam rgyur gyur cing /
NK015(ba)004:34: las kyi rnam par smin pa la brten pa /
NK015(ba)004:35: ming gi rnam grangs su srog gi dbang po zhes
NK015(ba)004:36: kyang bya ba ste ldan pa ma yin pa'i 'du
NK015(ba)004:41: sa bon btab pa'i dus kyi 'phen pas ji srid sa la lhung ba dang /
NK015(ba)004:42: 'bras bu smin pa'i bya ba grub kyi bar du 'gro ba dang /
NK015(ba)004:43: smin pa'i bya ba byed pa bzhin du /
NK015(ba)004:44: las kyis ji srid 'phangs pa de srid du 'tsho zhing gnas pa'i rang bzhin can no //
NK015(ba)004:49: gson pa'i las kyi dus la /
NK015(ba)004:50: +aa yuhste i na las ni tra'o //
NK015(ba)004:52: zhes pa ltar i na 'gro ba'i byings la u na sogs kyi u si sbyar /
NK015(ba)004:54: +aa yuhtshe zhes grub pa ni 'tsho ba'i dus la
NK015(ba)004:55: 'gro ba'i las brjod pa ste tshe skabs kyi don
NK015(ba)004:58: 'di rab tu 'gro ba'i phyir p+r+aa nahste ana las g+ha nya'o //
NK015(ba)004:60: yang na las la ana sbyar ba'ang bshad cing /
NK015(ba)004:61: srog ces bya ba rlung chen po //
NK015(ba)004:62: kha dang sna nas rgyu bar byed //
NK015(ba)004:63: ces pa ni snying gi rlung nyid brjod pa la
NK015(ba)004:64: rab tu sbyar ba ste srog rlung gi rnam grangs
NK015(ba)004:66: zhes p+r+aa nah'i sgra rab tu 'gro ba ste rtag
NK015(ba)004:67: tu phyi nang du rgyu ba'i las byed pas sam
NK015(ba)004:68: 'tsho ba'i dus ji srid du 'gro ba ste srog
NK015(ba)004:69: gam snying gi rlung la 'jug gi /
NK015(ba)004:70: bye brag srog 'dzin gyi rlung tsam kho na'i skabs don ma yin zhes pa'o //
NK015(ba)004:73: srog gi dbang po gang zhe na //
NK015(ba)004:74: khams gsum pa yi tshe yin no //
NK015(ba)004:75: zhes pas ngo bo la dbye ba byar med cing /
NK015(ba)004:77: rten dang brten pa'i bye brag las brtsams te dbye na gsum /
NK015(ba)004:85: sngon las kyi lus rten der tshe ring thung ji
NK015(ba)004:86: tsam zhig 'phangs pa'i srog gi rgyun ris mthun gnas
NK015(ba)004:87: par 'gyur ba de ni tshe'i 'du byed yin cing
NK015(ba)004:88: / da lta'i las sam byed pa'i 'bras bu'i dus
NK015(ba)004:89: ji srid bar 'tsho ba de ni srog gi 'du
NK015(ba)004:90: / byed do // mdo las bcom ldan 'das kyis /
NK015(ba)004:91: srog gi 'du byed dag byin gyis brlabs nas sku
NK015(ba)004:92: tshe'i 'du byed dag btang ngo zhes pas gsal lo
NK015(ba)004:93: // zhes mngon pa ba bzhed do //
NK015(ba)004:95: tshe'i rten drod dang rnam shes yin la /
NK015(ba)004:96: de dag gi rten kyang tshe yin pas phan tshun
NK015(ba)004:97: ltos nas 'jug pas drod dang rnam shes kyi rten
NK015(ba)004:98: gnyis so // sems dang yid kyi cha nas dbye ba byar med do //
NK015(ba)004:99: sems dang yid dang rnam shes ni //
NK015(ba)004:101: gnyis pa sngags kyi lugs ltar na //
NK015(ba)004:103: dbu mar srog gi lung brten par byas pas tshe dang nad med pa ster ro //
NK015(ba)004:106: rtsa dang rlung dang thig le'o //
NK015(ba)004:109: byang chub kyi sems myu gur gyur pa snying ga'i
NK015(ba)004:110: go skabs rnams su rnam pa bcu'i rtsa srog la
NK015(ba)004:111: sogs pa'i rlung rnams kyi rten du 'gyur te /
NK015(ba)004:112: de dag kyang shin tu phra ba ste skra'i tshad tsam mo //
NK015(ba)004:113: zhes pas khams drug ldan gyi gang zag gi dbang
NK015(ba)004:114: du byas te 'khor lo drug po'i bar na rang
NK015(ba)004:115: sor phyed dang bcu gsum gyi tshad ldan kun gzhi'i
NK015(ba)004:116: rnam par shes pa'i rten srog chen po'i rlung gis
NK015(ba)004:117: gang nas gnas pa stong sang nge ba nam mkha'
NK015(ba)004:118: dwangs pa lta bu a ba d+h+au ti dang su
NK015(ba)004:119: su ma sogs ming gi rnam grangs mang po dang
NK015(ba)004:120: ldan la srog brten pa'i cha nas srog gi rtsa
NK015(ba)004:121: zhes grags shing / ji srid 'khor lo'i dbu ma'i
NK015(ba)004:122: 'pho ba'i rtsa bcu gnyis su rlung dang byang chub
NK015(ba)004:123: kyi sems 'bab pa srid du 'tsho ba zhes bya
NK015(ba)004:127: dang po'i mgon po de nyid zhe sdang rdo rje zhal gsum bar 'gyur te /
NK015(ba)004:129: gang gi tshe mngal du kun gzhi'i rnam shes zhugs
NK015(ba)004:130: pa de'i tshe nyon mongs pa can gyi yid 'du
NK015(ba)004:131: byed pa langs pas dkar dmar gnyis kyi dwangs ma
NK015(ba)004:132: las srog rlung a'i rnam pa chags nas zla ba
NK015(ba)004:133: bcu la rlung bcu 'phel te da lta lus dang
NK015(ba)004:134: 'tsho ba'i rgyun gnas par byed cing ji srid 'phel
NK015(ba)004:135: 'grib med par rtsa thams cad du rlung rgyu ba
NK015(ba)004:136: de srid du 'tsho zhing 'chi ba'i ltas mi 'byung
NK015(ba)004:137: ba yin no // gsum pa ni /
NK015(ba)004:139: spyi bo bde chen 'khor lo na //
NK015(ba)004:141: phra ba byang chub sems kyi gnas //
NK015(ba)004:142: thams cad rten pa'i gzugs yin pas //
NK015(ba)004:143: byang chub snying po'i ngo bo nyid //
NK015(ba)004:144: ces sogs gsungs pa kun gzhi dang srog gi rlung
NK015(ba)004:145: rten byed pha ma las thob pa'i dkar cha ham
NK015(ba)004:146: dang dmar cha a thung gi rnam pa dbu ma'i
NK015(ba)004:147: yar mar sna rtser gnas pa la brten nas dwangs
NK015(ba)004:149: snyigs ma nyer bzhi rtsa stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis su thim /
NK015(ba)004:150: phra ba'i rtsa stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis dang /
NK015(ba)004:151: gtso mo nyer bzhi rnams la rlung khrag 'babs pa'i longs spyad zin thim pa /
NK015(ba)004:153: 'byung khungs bdag po ste rtsa'i rtse sked rtsa ba gsum la sbyar dgos zhes gsung /
NK015(ba)004:155: longs spyod bdag po'i tshul gyis 'bab pa ste thig
NK015(ba)004:156: le ji tsam rgyas pa de tsam du tshe dang
NK015(ba)004:157: bsod nams la sogs pa 'phel ba yin no //
NK015(ba)004:158: gsum pa gtsug lag las 'byung pa ltar na bzhi /
NK015(ba)004:166: gang zhig lus can 'tsho byed pa //
NK015(ba)004:167: snying la gnas dang khyab gyur gang //
NK015(ba)004:168: de ni srog gi gnas mchog yin //
NK015(ba)004:169: zhes 'byung ba ltar kha zas kyi dwangs ma lus
NK015(ba)004:170: zungs bdun po'i mthar phyin pa mdangs kyi mchog ces
NK015(ba)004:171: bya ba lus kun la khyab cing tshe ring du
NK015(ba)004:172: gnas pa'i rten du gyur pa gang yin pa'o //
NK015(ba)004:174: srog gam tshe gnas pa'i rten ngo bo tshe srog
NK015(ba)004:175: gi dris bgos pa bla rtsa'i nang nas srin lag
NK015(ba)004:176: brgyud de phyi rol du 'khyams pa las /
NK015(ba)004:177: mi de dbang thang zhan na mtshan mor rgyu ba'i
NK015(ba)004:178: 'byung po rnams kyis bdag tu bzung nas longs spyod
NK015(ba)004:179: pa las bla 'khyams pa dang 'phrog pa brkus pa
NK015(ba)004:180: sogs zer zhing rten bla la gnod pas brten pa
NK015(ba)004:181: tshe srog la'ang gnod par 'gyur ba de nyid brten
NK015(ba)004:182: pa'i rtsa la'ang bla rtsa zhes grags te /
NK015(ba)004:184: sems la rang dbang ma thob phyir bltas pas //
NK015(ba)004:185: ma rig srid pa'i lus ngan blangs pa yis //
NK015(ba)004:186: tshe srog rten du bla rtsa 'khyams po byung //
NK015(ba)004:190: de la sems can rnams kyi 'tsho ba ni khrag
NK015(ba)004:191: la rag las pa yin te khrag legs par gnas
NK015(ba)004:192: shing rgyu na ni srog kyang legs par gnas pa
NK015(ba)004:195: pho ba der ma zhu ba'i gnas la brten te
NK015(ba)004:196: de tshe dang stobs dang gzi mdangs 'byung ba chen
NK015(ba)004:197: po lnga'i dwangs ma dang khams bdun po 'phel zhing
NK015(ba)004:198: rgyas par byed do zhes srog 'tsho ba'i gtso bor
NK015(ba)004:199: bshad cing mngon pa nas gsungs pa'i drod dang gnad
NK015(ba)004:201: 'di dag la brten nas tshe gnas pa dang mi
NK015(ba)004:202: gnas pa'i 'gro ldog byed pas rnam grangs kyi dbye
NK015(ba)004:203: bar rung ste / lus dang srog gnas pa'i rtsa
NK015(ba)004:204: bar byed pas rtsa zhes pa lta bu bdag nyid
NK015(ba)004:205: gcig pa dang rten brten pa'i 'brel par grub cing
NK015(ba)004:206: bar rung ste / / 'di la brten nas tshe
NK015(ba)004:207: gnas pa'i rkyen dang 'chi med 'grub pa'i gnad sogs
NK015(ba)004:208: kyang zhar las shes par 'gyur ro //
NK015(ba)004:212: glo bur 'chi ba yod med bshad pa'o //
NK015(ba)004:214: sngags dang bcud len gyis rig pa 'dzin pa grub pa dang /
NK015(ba)004:215: rtse gcig tu mnyam par bzhag pa'i bsam gtan dngos gzhi thob pa dang /
NK015(ba)004:216: sems med snyoms 'jug dag ni 'phen pa ma rdzogs bar du 'tsho ba mi 'dor la /
NK015(ba)004:217: rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha rnams mi lo sa ya
NK015(ba)004:218: dgu 'tsho ba nas gong du 'phel te srid rtse
NK015(ba)004:219: ba rnams bskal chen brgyad khri'i bar du 'tsho ba
NK015(ba)004:220: dang / dmyal ba'i tshe tshad thung shos kyang mi'i
NK015(ba)004:221: lo grangs kyis gzhal bar dka' zhing ring shos bskal
NK015(ba)004:223: yi dwags mi lo sa ya gcig dang dgu 'bum /
NK015(ba)004:224: dud 'gro ring mtha' bskal pa nas thung mtha' skad cig ma'i bar ma nges par 'tsho ba dang /
NK015(ba)004:225: sgra mi snyan na tshe stong ste //
NK015(ba)004:226: gnyis na phyed phyed spangs pa'o /
NK015(ba)004:228: / 'di na ma nges tha mar ni //
NK015(ba)004:229: lo bcu dang po dpag tu med //
NK015(ba)004:230: ces pas mi'i 'jig rten byang gling pa lo stong /
NK015(ba)004:232: shar gling pa nyis brgya lnga bcur nges pa can du 'tsho la /
NK015(ba)004:233: lho gling 'dir ni thung mtha' tshe lo bcu dang /
NK015(ba)004:234: ring mtha' bskal pa dang po'i mi rnams tshe lo dpag med 'tsho la /
NK015(ba)004:235: deng sang tshe lo sum cu'am nyi shu kha ral ba'ang bzhed pas /
NK015(ba)004:237: de ring sang tsam mi 'chi zhes //
NK015(ba)004:238: bde bar 'dug pa rigs ma yin //
NK015(ba)004:240: tshe ni yun thung shes bya'i rnam pa mang //
NK015(ba)004:241: tshe yi tshad kyang ji tsam mi shes pas //
NK015(ba)004:242: ngang pas chu las 'o ma len pa bzhin //
NK015(ba)004:243: rang gi 'dod pa dang du blang bar byos //
NK015(ba)004:244: zhes gsungs pa ltar tshe'am chos sogs bsgrub bya la phyi bshol ma song ba kho na gces so //
NK015(ba)004:245: spyir dge ba'i las kyis tshe ring zhing bde bar 'tsho ba yin mod kyi /
NK015(ba)004:246: ngan 'gro rnams ni mi dge ba'i las kyis sdug
NK015(ba)004:247: bsngal myong ba'i yun shin tu ring bar grub pas
NK015(ba)004:248: las la yid ches par bya'o //
NK015(ba)004:250: mar me ni res 'ga' sdong bu zad pas dang /
NK015(ba)004:252: res 'ga' gnyis ka zad pas dang /
NK015(ba)004:253: res 'ga' gnyis ka ma zad kyang rlung la sogs
NK015(ba)004:254: pas 'chi ba bzhin du tshe zad pas 'chi la
NK015(ba)004:255: bsod nams zad pas ma yin pa dang /
NK015(ba)004:258: gnyis ka ma yin pa ste mu bzhi las /
NK015(ba)004:260: las kyis 'phangs pa'i srog gi rgyun rdzogs pas 'chi ba dang /
NK015(ba)004:262: longs spyod kyi rnam smin can gyi las zad pas 'chi ba dang /
NK015(ba)004:264: tshe dang longs spyod kyi rnam smin can gyi las gnyis ka zad pas 'chi ba dang /
NK015(ba)004:266: de gnyis ka ma zad kyang bag med pa'i spyod
NK015(ba)004:267: pa dang g.yul dang me chu sogs ya nga ba
NK015(ba)004:269: des na mu dang po'i phyir srog skyob pa dang /
NK015(ba)004:270: mchod rten bzhengs pa sogs rgyu mthun gyi dge ba rnams dang /
NK015(ba)004:271: gnyis pa'i phyir dkon mchog mchod pa sogs bsod nams kyi bya ba spyi dang /
NK015(ba)004:272: gsum pa'i don du gnyis ka la 'bad de 'chi ba bslu zhing /
NK015(ba)004:273: bzhi pa'i ched du zas dang spyod lam kun la bag yod par bya ba dang /
NK015(ba)004:274: ya nga ba'i gnas rnam pa kun tu spang /
NK015(ba)004:275: mo bon sman la sogs pas kyang phyi ma 'di
NK015(ba)004:276: tsam la phan gdags su rung gi snga ma gsum
NK015(ba)004:277: la ni de dag gi mthu 'jug pa ma yin
NK015(ba)004:278: no // dkar po'i rgyu de dag gzhir bzhag pa'i
NK015(ba)004:279: steng du sngags kyi bskyed rdzogs zab mos tshe bsgrubs
NK015(ba)004:280: pa ni bzhi ka la gces te bu lon ma
NK015(ba)004:281: khug pa'i dbul po gnyen khas drag gis mgon nas
NK015(ba)004:282: nor dang sprad pa lta bu'o //
NK015(ba)004:287: sgra mi snyan ma gtogs par 'chi /
NK015(ba)004:288: zhes pas dmigs bsal kha cig ma gtogs 'dod khams
NK015(ba)004:289: pa snyoms 'jug gnyis la ma zhugs pa rnams ni
NK015(ba)004:291: de dag gi lus la gnod pa byas pas tshe
NK015(ba)004:292: la gnod par 'gyur ba'i phyir tshe lus kyi rgyud
NK015(ba)004:293: la rags lus par 'jug pa zhes glo bur dang
NK015(ba)004:295: sgra mi snyan pa ni tshe tshad rangs por 'tsho yi bar 'chi med la /
NK015(ba)004:297: tshe lan gcig skyes nas gnas pa zhes 'gog pa
NK015(ba)004:298: dang 'du shes med pa'i snyoms 'jug gnyis dang byams
NK015(ba)004:299: pa sogs ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i 'dod khams pa
NK015(ba)004:300: dang / gzugs gzugs med kyi sems can /
NK015(ba)004:301: byang sems skye ba gcig gis thogs pa dang /
NK015(ba)004:302: tshe 'di nyid la dgra bcom thob pa'i srid pa tha ma pa /
NK015(ba)004:303: rgyal bas tshe tshad lung bstan pa /
NK015(ba)004:305: mthong lam dang byams pa chen po la zhugs pa /
NK015(ba)004:306: byang sems srid tha pa dang 'khor los sgyur rgyal /
NK015(ba)004:307: de dag lhums na yod pa'i yum la sogs pa
NK015(ba)004:308: ni rang rang gi tshe tshad dam bya ba'i 'bras
NK015(ba)004:309: bu ma grub kyi bar du glo bur 'chi ba
NK015(ba)004:311: de la dmyal ba pa rnams ni rgyal ba'i thugs
NK015(ba)004:312: rje dang rang rgyud la dge sems skyes pa sogs
NK015(ba)004:313: dkar po'i mthu yis glo bur du 'chi ba'i rgyu
NK015(ba)004:314: byed la / lha dang lha min g.yul sprod pa
NK015(ba)004:315: dang rtsed mos myos pas mtshon gzhan dag ni mi
NK015(ba)004:316: dge ba'i bsam sbyor dang bag med pa kho nas
NK015(ba)004:317: glo bur du 'chi ba'i rgyu rkyen byed pa dang
NK015(ba)004:318: byed la / / khyad par mi'i 'jig rten du
NK015(ba)004:319: 'jigs pa chen po bcu drug tu grags pa ni
NK015(ba)004:320: byed la / / / dus 'khor bsdus rgyud las /
NK015(ba)004:321: dgra dang seng ge glang chen dbang po me dang
NK015(ba)004:322: lto 'phye'i bdag po chom rkun zhags pas 'chi ba
NK015(ba)004:323: dang / chu gter 'khrugs pa dang ni sha za
NK015(ba)004:324: 'chi ba'i 'jigs byed nad dang dbang po'i nye bar
NK015(ba)004:325: dang / 'tshe ba dang / dbul dang bud med
NK015(ba)004:326: bral dang mi bdag 'khrugs pa'i 'jigs pa dang ni
NK015(ba)004:327: rdo rje ltung dang don nyams pa /
NK015(ba)004:329: 'jigs pa glo bur ba de dag sngags la sogs pa'i mthus bzlog par 'gyur ba'i tshul yang /
NK015(ba)004:331: gang zhig rnal 'byor ma rnams zhabs ni nyin zhag
NK015(ba)004:332: so sor dran byed de la rab tu nyams par
NK015(ba)004:334: mdo las glor bur du 'chi ba'i rgyu dgur gsungs te /
NK015(ba)004:336: zas 'grangs kyang mang du za ba /
NK015(ba)004:337: snga ma ma zhu phyi ma za ba /
NK015(ba)004:338: gshang gci dus su mi 'dor ba /
NK015(ba)004:339: nad pas sman pa dang nad g.yog la mi nyan pa /
NK015(ba)004:342: ma brtags pa'i drag shul spyod pa /
NK015(ba)004:343: bag med par 'khrig pa spyod pa rnams dang /
NK015(ba)004:344: gzhan yang glo bur brgyad cu rtsa gcig tu grags
NK015(ba)004:345: pa sogs mang yang de dag tu ma 'dus pa
NK015(ba)004:346: med la / mdor na de dag ma byung ba'i
NK015(ba)004:347: snga rol nas bsrung ba dang spang ba la mkhas
NK015(ba)004:348: par bya ba ni tshe ring por 'tsho ba'i cho
NK015(ba)004:352: 'chi ltas bye brag tu bshad pa'o //
NK015(ba)004:358: slob dpon ngag gi dbang phyug grags pas /
NK015(ba)004:359: lha dang 'byung ba gnyis ka ni /
NK015(ba)004:364: / 'di las dbye ba mtshon par bya //
NK015(ba)004:365: zhes gsungs pa ltar gsum dang /
NK015(ba)004:366: de re re la'ang phyi dang nang gi dbye bas gnyis gnyis su 'gyur te /
NK015(ba)004:367: lha 'khrugs pa'am lha las gyur pa la thog lhung ba sogs phyi dang /
NK015(ba)004:369: 'byung ba 'khrugs pa'am 'byung ba las gyur pa la me chu sogs kyis 'tshe ba phyi dang /
NK015(ba)004:371: lha dang 'byung ba gnyis ka 'khrugs pa la'ang phyi dang nang gi dbye bas drug tu 'gyur ro //
NK015(ba)004:373: rang rang gi khams 'tsho ba'i rgyu tshe'i 'phen pa dang /
NK015(ba)004:374: sngon nas bsags pa'i las kyi lhag ma dang /
NK015(ba)004:375: bsod nams kyi mthu gsum las gang rung zad pa ste rkyang zad gsum dang /
NK015(ba)004:376: de dag gnyis gnyis zad pa dang /
NK015(ba)004:377: lhan cig tu zad pa ste gsum ka'ang sngon bsags las kyi 'phen pa la rags las shing /
NK015(ba)004:378: 'phral rkyen gyi 'gro ldog la'ang nges par ltos te /
NK015(ba)004:380: dam nyams sems dkrugs yi chad dngangs pa dang //
NK015(ba)004:381: zhe sdang drag pos rbod gtong tshar bcad dang //
NK015(ba)004:382: sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig nyams pa dang //
NK015(ba)004:383: gnas ngan dag tu gnas pa phab 'di dag ni //
NK015(ba)004:384: tshe nyams dbugs dngangs bgegs kyi dbang du 'gyur //
NK015(ba)004:387: rkun ma nya dang ri dwags sbrul //
NK015(ba)004:388: bya sogs srog la chags pa rnams /
NK015(ba)004:391: tshe ring ba yang tshe thung 'gyur //
NK015(ba)004:392: zhes srog gcod sogs rang bzhin dang bcas pa'i kha
NK015(ba)004:393: na ma tho ba 'phel bas rnam par dkar ba'i
NK015(ba)004:394: las kyi 'phro rdzogs pa'i rkyen dang /
NK015(ba)004:395: mchod rten 'jig pa dang dge 'dun gyi chos 'khor
NK015(ba)004:396: 'joms pa sogs bsod nams ma yin pa'i las kyis
NK015(ba)004:397: bsod nams 'dzad pa'i rkyen byed pas /
NK015(ba)004:398: las kyi 'phen pa zad na dus kyi 'chi ltas dang /
NK015(ba)004:399: rkyen gyi dbang las dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ltas 'byung ba'i rgyu byed cing /
NK015(ba)004:400: tshe dang las dang bsod nams gsum po'ang mar me
NK015(ba)004:401: dang sdong bu dang mar khu bzhin du gcig la
NK015(ba)004:402: gcig brten te ring du 'tsho bar byed do //
NK015(ba)004:404: rang rang dbugs kyi grangs nyi khri chig stong drug
NK015(ba)004:405: brgya la nyin zhag re rtsis pa'i lo brgya na
NK015(ba)004:406: rtsa rlung thig le gsum po sdud pa'i rim pas
NK015(ba)004:408: rkyen glo bur ba'i dbang gis g.yas g.yon nyi zla'i
NK015(ba)004:409: rgyu ba yon po shugs cher 'phel zhing lte bar
NK015(ba)004:412: spyi bor la rkang gi rim pa rnams yun thung
NK015(ba)004:413: ngus 'dor ba las dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ltas
NK015(ba)004:416: / 'di ni rgyas par spro na mtha' yas pas gsang
NK015(ba)004:417: sngags kyi rgyud lung man ngag rnams las rtogs dgos
NK015(ba)004:423: ltas ji tsam 'byung ba la dpyad /
NK015(ba)004:426: 'chi bdag bslu ba'i rtogs pa las /
NK015(ba)004:428: mtshan nyid shes par 'dod gyur pa //
NK015(ba)004:429: des ni bder gnas lus las ni //
NK015(ba)004:430: shes bya gzhan du yid gnyis 'gyur //
NK015(ba)004:431: khams mi snyoms dang 'dod chags dang //
NK015(ba)004:432: rab rib la sogs mthu las dang /
NK015(ba)004:434: / 'jigs dang mya ngan sogs kyi mthus //
NK015(ba)004:435: gang las gzhan du so sor snang //
NK015(ba)004:437: gnyis pa la gzhung lugs man ngag rnams su dbye
NK015(ba)004:438: bsdu du ma mchis kyang mdor bsdu na gnyis te
NK015(ba)004:441: karka ta dang chu srin gyi 'pho ba'i nyin zhag
NK015(ba)004:442: gi nyin gung rang grib 'phel 'grib go ldog pa'am
NK015(ba)004:443: tshad las 'das par 'grib pa ni 'chi ba'i ltas
NK015(ba)004:444: dang / tshad las 'das par 'phel ba nad kyis
NK015(ba)004:445: 'tshe ba'i ltas te de sogs grib ma la brtag
NK015(ba)004:446: dang / pa dang / rkang mthil dang lte ba
NK015(ba)004:447: phug snyam byed na nyin zhag gsum gyi gong du
NK015(ba)004:448: lnga par 'gyur ba sogs glo bur zug rngu la
NK015(ba)004:449: dang / pa dang / brtag pa dang / gshang gci'i mnyam por sbrid pa byung ba /
NK015(ba)004:450: dkar po'i tshes gcig la khams nag por 'bab pa /
NK015(ba)004:454: tshangs pa'i skud pa chad pa sogs lus la brtags pa dang /
NK015(ba)004:455: mig gis gzugs dang rna bas sgra sogs yul rnams
NK015(ba)004:456: tshul ldan du mi 'dzin pa'am log par 'dzin te
NK015(ba)004:457: 'khrul ba sna tshogs su myang ba sogs dbang po
NK015(ba)004:459: sprin med nam mkhar snga dro phyi dro'am /
NK015(ba)004:460: yang na zla 'od rang gi grib mar yun ring
NK015(ba)004:461: bltas pa'i grib gzugs nam mkhar mthong ba la skyon
NK015(ba)004:462: yod med brtag pa ste grib gzugs la brtag pa
NK015(ba)004:463: dang / rtsa sdud cing rlung yon por rgyu ba
NK015(ba)004:464: dang rtsa gnas su gdon zhugs te nad drangs pa'i
NK015(ba)004:465: rkyen las mun rub nyi zla nub pa dang /
NK015(ba)004:466: rgyan gos phreng ba dmar po thogs pa /
NK015(ba)004:468: bong bu la zhon nas lho phyogs su 'gro ba sogs tshe nyams pa /
NK015(ba)004:470: nyes pa gsum dang 'dus pas glo bur du 'chi
NK015(ba)004:471: ba'i ltas so sor snang ba'i rmi lam la brtag
NK015(ba)004:472: pa rnams te rgyas par ni 'chi bslu'i rtogs pa
NK015(ba)004:474: gnyis pa ni rlung la brtag pa ste de la gnyis /
NK015(ba)004:478: ma rig chu srin ro hi ta //
NK015(ba)004:479: zhes gsungs pa ltar rten 'brel dang sbyar pa'i dbang
NK015(ba)004:480: gis rgyal zla'i 'pho ba thog mar byas te nad
NK015(ba)004:481: med tha mal du gnas pa'i skyes bus rlung gi
NK015(ba)004:483: de'ang dkar phyogs tshes gcig nas brtsams nyi ma gsum
NK015(ba)004:484: du nangs par nam langs nas thun phyed bar zla
NK015(ba)004:485: ba'i rlung thog mar byas te rgyu /
NK015(ba)004:486: de nas nyin gsum nyi ma'i rlung thog mar byas
NK015(ba)004:487: te rgyu ba sogs res mos su rgyu ba la
NK015(ba)004:488: 'pho 'chug med na tshe rang bzhin du gnas shing
NK015(ba)004:489: / gal te nyi ma lnga drug tshun chad phyin
NK015(ba)004:490: ci log tu rgyu na rtsod pa dang mya ngan
NK015(ba)004:492: phyogs gcig log na nad mi bzad pas theb /
NK015(ba)004:493: phyogs gnyis log na grogs po nye du rgud /
NK015(ba)004:494: phyogs gsum du go ldog pa dang /
NK015(ba)004:495: kha sna gsum ka nas rgyu ba /
NK015(ba)004:496: mnyam rgyu zhag bcu'i bar du mi 'pho ba /
NK015(ba)004:497: thun phyed gcig la'ang lan mang du 'pho /
NK015(ba)004:498: kha gcig pu nas rgyu ba sogs ni gdon mi za bar 'chi ba'i ltas so //
NK015(ba)004:504: mchu zla drug po'i khyim 'pho nas brtsams te nyi
NK015(ba)004:505: ma lnga lngar nyi ma'i rlung kho na rgyu na
NK015(ba)004:511: lo gsum gyi 'og tu 'chi bar 'gyur la /
NK015(ba)004:512: zla ba'i rlung de bzhin du rgyu ba na'ang nad la sogs pa'i 'tshe ba 'byung ngo //
NK015(ba)004:514: skyes khyim du skyes skar la zla ba son cing
NK015(ba)004:515: nyi ma bdun zur ba yod pa de'i tshe rgyas
NK015(ba)004:516: pa'i dus zhes bya ba 'tsho 'chi brtag pa'i khyad
NK015(ba)004:518: rgyas pa'i dus su nyi ma'i rlung nyin phyed kyi
NK015(ba)004:519: bar du rgyu na lo bcu bzhi nas 'chi zhing
NK015(ba)004:520: zhag gcig rgyu na lo bcu gnyis su 'chi ba
NK015(ba)004:521: nas / zhag bco lngar rgyu na lo gcig /
NK015(ba)004:522: zhag nyer lngar rgyu na zla gsum /
NK015(ba)004:523: zla gcig rgyu na zhag gsum /
NK015(ba)004:524: nyi ma so gsum rgyu na de nyid kyi nyin mor 'chi ba sogs shes par bya zhing /
NK015(ba)004:525: nang gi ltas ni 'tsho 'chi rtog pa la shin tu gal che ste /
NK015(ba)004:527: ji srid nang gi mtshan nyid ni //
NK015(ba)004:528: yang dag nges pa ma gyur na //
NK015(ba)004:529: phyi yi mtshan nyid kho nas ni /
NK015(ba)004:531: / 'chi ltas legs par nges ma yin //
NK015(ba)004:532: gnyis ka nges par gsal ba ni /
NK015(ba)004:535: phyi rol blo ni phyin ci log /
NK015(ba)004:536: nad la sogs pas kyang bskyed do //
NK015(ba)004:537: zhes rgyu mtshan dang bcas te gsungs so //
NK015(ba)004:538: gzhan yang snga 'gyur gyi rgyud las /
NK015(ba)004:539: bzhin 'gyur spyod lam rnams ni 'chal ba dang //
NK015(ba)004:540: slob dpon 'tsho byed dus las yol ba dang //
NK015(ba)004:541: kha zas rnams kyang yi gar mi 'ong ba /
NK015(ba)004:543: / 'di dag rnams ni nyams pa'i rtags yin no //
NK015(ba)004:544: zhes sogs nges pa dang ma nges pa dang /
NK015(ba)004:545: nye ba dang ring ba'i 'chi ltas kyi bye brag
NK015(ba)004:546: ni bsam gyis mi khyab pas gzhan las shes par
NK015(ba)004:548: gsum pa dus gang du brtags na /
NK015(ba)004:550: nyin mtshan sdod pa yong med par //
NK015(ba)004:552: bsnon pa gud nas yong med na //
NK015(ba)004:554: zhes nges par 'chi zhing myur du 'chi ba'i nges
NK015(ba)004:555: pa can yin pas phyi bshol mi bya bar chos
NK015(ba)004:556: bsgrub pa dang 'chi ba bslu ba'i thabs la da
NK015(ba)004:558: rtsa rlung gi nus pa sdud zin pa dang /
NK015(ba)004:559: nad kyis lus zungs bcom pa dang /
NK015(ba)004:560: 'byung gdon gyis gnad la theb zin nas 'chi ba bslur med do //
NK015(ba)004:562: 'og khang la me shor skabs thabs kyis gsod na bcos su yod kyi /
NK015(ba)004:563: steng khang la shor nas mi gsod cing 'chos su med pa dang 'dra'o //
NK015(ba)004:564: de la dgongs te slob dpon gyis /
NK015(ba)004:565: 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid ring mo nas //
NK015(ba)004:566: shes bya 'os pas bcos par bya //
NK015(ba)004:567: spyi bor thog ni bab pa'i tshe //
NK015(ba)004:568: rab tu mkhas kyang ci byar yod //
NK015(ba)004:572: ji ltar 'bras bu'i me tog dang //
NK015(ba)004:573: me yi du ba char gyi sprin //
NK015(ba)004:574: phyis 'byung mtshan ma yin pa ltar //
NK015(ba)004:580: zhes 'byung ste 'jig rten 'bras bu dang me dang
NK015(ba)004:581: char pa rnams 'byung ba'i snga ltas me tog du
NK015(ba)004:582: ba sprin rnams kyi mtshan ma 'byung ba bzhin du
NK015(ba)004:583: rgyu sngar byung na 'bras bu phyis 'byung ba la
NK015(ba)004:587: 'chi ltas rnams ni mtha' yas phyir //
NK015(ba)004:589: thams cad rim pas kyang ma yin /
NK015(ba)004:591: / 'on kyang gcig sogs grangs kyis so //
NK015(ba)004:592: zhes gsungs pa ltar skyes bu gcig gi 'tsho ba
NK015(ba)004:593: zad pa la 'chi ltas grangs med pa de dag
NK015(ba)004:594: rim dang cig car du 'byung ba ma yin cing
NK015(ba)004:595: / nges pa'i 'chi ltas ni gcig gam gnyis sogs 'byung la des kyang nges par 'chi zhing /
NK015(ba)004:596: ma nges pa'i 'chi ltas mang du byung yang 'chi
NK015(ba)004:597: ba bslu ba'i thabs kyis bzlog par 'gyur ba dang
NK015(ba)004:598: / yang kha cig rmi lam dang rnam 'gyur la
NK015(ba)004:599: sogs pa'i 'chi ltas ma byung yang 'chi bar 'gyur
NK015(ba)004:601: rlung 'them pa sogs nges par 'chi ltas shar rung rang gis ma nges pa dang /
NK015(ba)004:602: rmi lam la sogs pa'i ltas byung rung mi 'chi ba ni lhas chos la bskul ba dang /
NK015(ba)004:603: chos spyod pa la 'byung po la sogs pas gnod pa rtsom pa'i ltas su rig par bya'o //
NK015(ba)004:606: 'chi ba ring nas nges byed cing //
NK015(ba)004:607: ji ltar nus pas gtong ba dang //
NK015(ba)004:608: gso ba la yang 'jug pa ni //
NK015(ba)004:609: rab tu grub pa chen por 'gyur //
NK015(ba)004:611: 'chi ba'i ltas ma shes pas nam 'chi'i dus tshod mi shes /
NK015(ba)004:612: de ma shes pas chos dang 'tsho thabs la brtson 'grus rtsom pa mi byed /
NK015(ba)004:613: de ma brtsams pas tshe zad pa ma tshor bar
NK015(ba)004:614: 'chi ba'i dus thebs te bslur med pas ring mo
NK015(ba)004:615: nas 'tsho 'chi brtags te 'tsho thabs la 'bad pas
NK015(ba)004:616: ring 'tsho'i 'bras bu tshegs med par 'grub par 'gyur
NK015(ba)004:617: ro // bdun pa 'tsho thabs kyi cho ga la mtha' yas kyang bsdu na gnyis te /
NK015(ba)004:627: rgyal ba'i ring bsrel nor bu'i mchog /
NK015(ba)004:629: nyan thos rang rgyal byang chub sems //
NK015(ba)004:630: de bzhin rnal 'byor ldan pa'i gdung //
NK015(ba)004:631: mchod cing lus la bcangs pa yis //
NK015(ba)004:632: gdon kun phyogs su nye mi nus //
NK015(ba)004:633: zhes pa ltar de dag ni 'chang ba lta ci smos //
NK015(ba)004:634: mthong thos dran reg tsam gyis sdig sgrib zhi zhing
NK015(ba)004:635: 'dod pa'i dngos grub 'byung ba sogs phan yon mtha'
NK015(ba)004:636: yas shing nor bu mchog rnams kyang rgyal ba'i gdung
NK015(ba)004:637: 'ba' zhig las grub pa yin no //
NK015(ba)004:640: rin chen mtshan nyid bstan bcos su //
NK015(ba)004:641: bshad pas rab brtags rdo rje 'chang //
NK015(ba)004:642: tshe yi nor bu 'chang ba'ang rung //
NK015(ba)004:643: de bzhin sna tshogs nor bu 'chang //
NK015(ba)004:644: in+d+ra n+ai la rin chen sogs //
NK015(ba)004:645: nor bu chen po gzhan dag kyang //
NK015(ba)004:646: bcangs pas 'chi ba thams cad ni //
NK015(ba)004:647: don la thugs bsnyel ba mi mnga' bar don mdzad pa'i rtags su /
NK015(ba)004:650: thub drug kun dge slong gi cha byad can du bzheng /
NK015(ba)004:666: shar lhor lha la lho phyogs mi //
NK015(ba)004:682: sbrul dang gla ba'i nor bu /
NK015(ba)004:686: kun ban+d+ha la sogs pa'i rin po che bcangs pas
NK015(ba)004:687: nad gdon rims dug sogs srung zhing zhi ba dang
NK015(ba)004:688: / 'ga' zhig cho ga dang sbyar na tshe ring
NK015(ba)004:689: por 'tsho ba'i bcud len du 'gyur ba sogs nor
NK015(ba)004:690: bu sna re'i phan yon kyang bsam gyis mi khyab
NK015(ba)004:695: sman gyi nor bu a ru ra rnam par rgyal ba dang /
NK015(ba)004:699: yungs dkar la sogs pa rang bzhin gyis grub pa dang /
NK015(ba)004:700: rin chen ril bu dang mang sbyor chen mo la
NK015(ba)004:701: sogs pa sbyor ba'i sman rnams bcangs pa'am zos pa'i
NK015(ba)004:702: phan yon kyang mngon du 'byung ste /
NK015(ba)004:704: grub pa'i sman ni gzhan rnams kyang //
NK015(ba)004:705: nges par brten par gyur pa yis //
NK015(ba)004:706: tshe 'phel ba dang rga ba'i nad //
NK015(ba)004:707: zad pas 'chi ba mi mthong ngo //
NK015(ba)004:710: bcud len gyi bstan bcos rnams nas 'byung ba bzhin sbyor tshul brten lugs bsam gyis mi khyab la /
NK015(ba)004:712: bdud rtsi lnga po rab sbyar ba //
NK015(ba)004:713: man ngag ji bzhin bsten pa yis /
NK015(ba)004:716: kha sbyor la sogs rgyud las gsungs //
NK015(ba)004:718: dngul dang gser sogs kyis bcings pa'i //
NK015(ba)004:719: dngul chu cho ga bzhin zos na //
NK015(ba)004:720: grub pa'i bcud len rang bzhin phyir /
NK015(ba)004:723: zhes pa la sogs pa gzhung rnams su rgya cher
NK015(ba)004:724: 'byung ba nyid brten par bya ste rgas pa skra
NK015(ba)004:725: dkar gnyer ma dang bral zhing tshe nyi zla dang
NK015(ba)004:726: mnyam pa sogs bcud len gyi mthu ni bsam gyis
NK015(ba)004:727: mi khyab bo // gsum pa la bzhi ste /
NK015(ba)004:728: lus kyi bya ba lha khang mchod rten sku gzugs gsar du bzhengs pa sogs rdzas /
NK015(ba)004:733: yul 7ngan che na sbyin pa ni //
NK015(ba)004:734: rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bdun //
NK015(ba)004:737: las byung ba'i bsod nams bdun dang /
NK015(ba)004:741: rten gsum la mchod pa'i bye brag 'bul ba /
NK015(ba)004:742: dge 'dun la chos ston gsol ba /
NK015(ba)004:743: pha ma bla ma ye shes rgan pa bsnyen bkur ba /
NK015(ba)004:744: mchod rten la phyag dang bskor ba byed pa la sogs pa dang /
NK015(ba)004:745: ngag gi bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
NK015(ba)004:747: phal po che la sogs pa theg pa chen po'i mdo sde zab cing rgya che ba rnams dang /
NK015(ba)004:748: gsang sngags kyi rgyud sde zab mo rnams dang srung ba lnga dang gza' yum la sogs pa'i gzungs /
NK015(ba)004:749: khyad par tshe dpag med dang gtsug tor rnam rgyal
NK015(ba)004:750: gtsug tor dri med la sogs pa'i gzungs rang gis
NK015(ba)004:752: dge slong tshul dang ldan pa la bkur bsti dang bcas te 'don 'jug pa dang /
NK015(ba)004:753: yid kyi bya ba rtogs pa las /
NK015(ba)004:755: dad pa nyid kyis bya bar nus //
NK015(ba)004:756: de bas dad pa brtan par bya //
NK015(ba)004:757: gzhan du ngal ba don med 'gyur //
NK015(ba)004:758: zhes sogs 'byung ba ltar dkon mchog la dad pa brtan po dang /
NK015(ba)004:760: bsgrub bya'i lha la nges shes dang /
NK015(ba)004:761: khyad par byams pa dang snying rje byang chub kyi
NK015(ba)004:762: sems la nan tan du bslab cing 'tsho ba'i cho
NK015(ba)004:763: ga la spro ba chen po dang ldan par bya'o
NK015(ba)004:764: // gsum ka'i bya bar bden pa dang dka' thub /
NK015(ba)004:770: tshogs 'khor la sogs pa bya ba dang /
NK015(ba)004:772: bya nya ri dwags rkun ma dang /
NK015(ba)004:773: sbrul sogs gsad bya'i phyogs gyur rnams //
NK015(ba)004:774: srog bskyabs pa yis 'phral du ni //
NK015(ba)004:775: tshe thung ba yang tshe ring 'gyur //
NK015(ba)004:777: btson ra nad dang gdung ba dang /
NK015(ba)004:780: bskyabs byas na ni nges par du //
NK015(ba)004:781: tshe ring 'chi ba bslu byed yin //
NK015(ba)004:782: zhes pa ltar 'bras bu'i rgyu mthun pa la nan tan du 'bad pa dang /
NK015(ba)004:783: khyad par dben par ras bris bkram pa'i mdun du mchod pa dang gtsang sbra bcas te /
NK015(ba)004:784: lha la sems rtse gcig pas spyan ras gzigs yi ge phyed bzhi pa 'bru 'bum bzla ba dang /
NK015(ba)004:785: sgrol ma'i snying po bcu bdun ma dang /
NK015(ba)004:786: sor 'brang ma'i snying po grangs su bzlas pa'i mthar dur+b+aa'i sbyin sreg bcu cha bya ba dang /
NK015(ba)004:787: spyan ma'i rig pa bkru ba'i cho ga dang /
NK015(ba)004:788: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yi ge brgya pa cho ga ltar bzla ba dang /
NK015(ba)004:789: 'jig rten dbang phyug 'chi ba las rgyal gyi gsang
NK015(ba)004:790: sngags 'bru 'bum bzlas mthar me tog dkar po'i sbyin
NK015(ba)004:791: sreg byed pa la sogs pas sdig pa dang nad
NK015(ba)004:792: zhi ba dang / 'chi ba bslus nas nges par
NK015(ba)004:793: tshe ring por 'gyur te sngags kyi mthu ni bsam
NK015(ba)004:795: gnyis pa nang ltar na gnyis /
NK015(ba)004:796: gzhan gyis 'tsho ba'i cho ga byed pa dang /
NK015(ba)004:799: tshe nyams pa la sogs pa'i ltas mthong yang rang
NK015(ba)004:800: nyid kyis gso ba'i thabs mi shes pa'i skye bo
NK015(ba)004:801: phal pa'am / shes kyang nyams su len mi nus
NK015(ba)004:802: pa dag gis mkhyen brtse nus pa dang ldan pa'i
NK015(ba)004:803: rdo rje'i slob dpon gzhan la brten te ring 'tsho'i
NK015(ba)004:805: de'i mtshan nyid kyang snga 'gyur gyi rgyud las /
NK015(ba)004:806: ting 'dzin phra mo las su rung ba dang //
NK015(ba)004:807: rgyud kyi don la mkhas shing dbang thob pa //
NK015(ba)004:808: mthu byin che zhing dam can nye ba gsum /
NK015(ba)004:810: / 'di gsum gang gis bkug kyang khug par 'gyur //
NK015(ba)004:811: zhes gsungs pa ltar te gso byed kyi tshul ni
NK015(ba)004:812: lhag pa'i lha khyad par can gyis rnal 'byor la
NK015(ba)004:813: brten nas rang don du sgrub pa'i tshul ltar la
NK015(ba)004:814: ting nge 'dzin gyi kha sgyur ci rigs su bya
NK015(ba)004:815: ba yin no // gnyis pa la gnyis /
NK015(ba)004:816: bskyed rim gyis bsring ba dang /
NK015(ba)004:817: rdzogs rim la brten nas bsring pa'o //
NK015(ba)004:822: sgrol ma 'byung ba'i rgyud phyi ma las /
NK015(ba)004:824: dang por 'bum phrag bzlas byas nas //
NK015(ba)004:825: mchod rten la sogs byed pa dang //
NK015(ba)004:826: mchod dang bskor ba la sogs bya //
NK015(ba)004:828: char 'bebs pa la rlung mnan pa'am /
NK015(ba)004:829: lo tog bskrun pa la gnod pa srung ba'i bya ba gtsor 'don dgos pa ltar /
NK015(ba)004:830: 'dod pa'i don sgrub pa la thog mar bar chad
NK015(ba)004:831: nges par zhi bar ma byas na 'bad pa don
NK015(ba)004:833: spyi 'gror bgegs mthar byed kyi rtsa sngags sam snying po 'bum dang sbyin sreg khri bya ba'am /
NK015(ba)004:834: dmigs gsal rang rigs kyi lha bdud bgegs 'dul ba
NK015(ba)004:835: la ched du basngagasa pa'i khro bo chen po gang
NK015(ba)004:836: yang rung ba'i bsgom bzlas sbyin sreg dang bcas pas
NK015(ba)004:837: bar chad thams cad nye bar zhi bar bya ste
NK015(ba)004:838: tshong don gnyer du 'gro ba la skyel ma'am grogs
NK015(ba)004:839: stobs chen dang 'grogs pa bzhin tshe sgrub spyi la
NK015(ba)004:841: gsar rnying gi man ngag 'gar tshe rta zung 'brel
NK015(ba)004:842: dang tshe phur sbrags ma sogs 'byung ba'ang don 'di
NK015(ba)004:843: la dgongs pa'o // gnyis pa dngos gzhi la /
NK015(ba)004:844: spyir rang gi lhag pa'i lha gang yin pa'i rnal 'byor la rtse gcig tu gnas pa dang /
NK015(ba)004:845: khyad par 'chi med tshe dbang stsol ba la ched
NK015(ba)004:846: du thugs bskyed cing smon lam yongs su grub pa
NK015(ba)004:847: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad /
NK015(ba)004:850: yid bzhin 'khor lo la sogs pa gtso bo rkyang
NK015(ba)004:851: pa'i bskyed rim nan tan du bslab cing bzlas pa
NK015(ba)004:852: bya ba dang / phyag na rdo rje 'chi bdag 'joms dpal /
NK015(ba)004:854: gtsug tor dri med sogs dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i bskyed bzlas bya ba dang /
NK015(ba)004:855: sdom pa'i rgyud las gsungs pa keng rus t+aa ta'i gdams ngag gam /
NK015(ba)004:856: zla ba ba 'jo'i bsam gtan sogs gang yang rung
NK015(ba)004:857: ba'i bsam gtan la zla ba drug la sogs par
NK015(ba)004:858: rtse gcig tu gnas pas nges par 'chi ba las
NK015(ba)004:861: mtshan bcas kyi rdzogs ma dang /
NK015(ba)004:862: mtshan med kyi rdzogs rim la brten te tshe bsring ba'o //
NK015(ba)004:871: brjod dang dmigs par bcas pa dang //
NK015(ba)004:872: brda gyur dag ni don dam mo //
NK015(ba)004:873: zhes rdor bzlas kyi dbye ba bzhir gsungs pa gang
NK015(ba)004:874: yang rung ba 'bum 'phrag gcig bzlas pas tshe nyams
NK015(ba)004:875: pa'ang lo lngar 'tsho ba sdom 'byung las gsungs /
NK015(ba)004:876: khyad par bdud rtsi sdud pa'am rtsol ba 'gog pa
NK015(ba)004:877: zhes tshe bsring ba la mchog tu basngagasa pa'i man
NK015(ba)004:880: rlung ni 'jug pa basngagasa pa yin //
NK015(ba)004:881: bdud rtsi 'tsho bar byed pa'i thabs //
NK015(ba)004:882: de phyir 'chi bas mi tshugs so //
NK015(ba)004:883: rim gyis 'bum sogs grangs kyis ni //
NK015(ba)004:884: rtse gcig sems kyi cho ga bzhin //
NK015(ba)004:885: rlung ni 'jug pa bsgrang ba ni //
NK015(ba)004:886: sgra yod pa yi bzlas par bshad //
NK015(ba)004:887: sgra med bzlas pa 'bum phrag gi //
NK015(ba)004:888: cho ga yongs su rdzogs pa yis //
NK015(ba)004:889: mi ni tshe nyams gyur pa yang //
NK015(ba)004:890: lo lnga'i bar du 'tsho bar nges //
NK015(ba)004:891: nyis 'bum la sogs bzlas pa nyid //
NK015(ba)004:892: tshe 'phel bar ni bsgre bar bya //
NK015(ba)004:894: nang bar langs nas stong phrag gcig /
NK015(ba)004:895: rtag tu legs par bgrangs na ni //
NK015(ba)004:896: nad kun las ni rnam grol zhing //
NK015(ba)004:897: nyi zla gnas kyi bar du 'tsho //
NK015(ba)004:899: gnyis pa bum pa can che 'bring chung gsum las chen po grub pas tshe bsring bar 'gyur te /
NK015(ba)004:901: nyin mtshan du ni dbu mar srog /
NK015(ba)004:902: zhugs pas nad rnams 'phrog par byed //
NK015(ba)004:903: tshes kyi nyin zhag srog bcings nas /
NK015(ba)004:905: / 'dis ni mkha' spyod nyid ster phyed //
NK015(ba)004:906: zla gcig srog bsad snying gar gnas //
NK015(ba)004:908: zhes bum can zhag gcig 'chings nus pas nad las rgyal ba dang /
NK015(ba)004:909: zla phyed kyis mkha' spyod 'grub pa dang /
NK015(ba)004:910: zla gcig gis 'chi med 'grub par bshad do //
NK015(ba)004:912: skra dkar la sogs pa 'jig cing 'jigs pa las
NK015(ba)004:913: srung ba sogs phan stobs chen po dang ldan pa'i
NK015(ba)004:914: lce rtse rkan sbyar gyis bzlas pa /
NK015(ba)004:915: 'phral du 'chi ltas zlog cing yun du 'chi med
NK015(ba)004:916: 'grub pa'i nam mkha' 'jo ba'i bsam gtan la sogs
NK015(ba)004:917: 'chi ltas kyi 'phel ba zlog pa yon po srong
NK015(ba)004:918: ba la sogs pa gdams ngag so so las 'ongs
NK015(ba)004:919: pa'i gnad dang sbyar te rtse gcig gam zhar byung
NK015(ba)004:920: du bsgoms pas kyang tshe sring ba'i nus pa chen
NK015(ba)004:921: po dang ldan pas 'di dag ni gzhan kun gyi
NK015(ba)004:922: yan lag tu sbyor ba'ang bya'o //
NK015(ba)004:923: gnyis pa mtshan med kyi rdzogs rim la rnam grangs dang /
NK015(ba)004:926: mkhas pas dngos po mi sgom zhing //
NK015(ba)004:927: dngos po med pa'ang bsam mi bya //
NK015(ba)004:928: dngos dang dngos med las rnams grol //
NK015(ba)004:929: de spangs pa ni bsgom par bya //
NK015(ba)004:930: zhes pa'i tshul la dpyad sgom pas rgyas 'debs dang /
NK015(ba)004:931: 'jog sgom pas mos dapyadakyi tshul gyis nyams su len pa dang /
NK015(ba)004:932: gnyis pa yul rnam kun mchog ldan gyi stong nyid dang /
NK015(ba)004:933: yul can 'gyur med kyi bde ba chen po ro
NK015(ba)004:934: mnyam mngon sum lam du byed de ting nge 'dzin
NK015(ba)004:936: de dag gis ni srid pa'i 'chi ba sogs chu bo bzhin gtan du gcod pa'i phyir /
NK015(ba)004:938: rnam kun 'chi ba bslu ba ni //
NK015(ba)004:939: grol ba nyid la rags pa yin //
NK015(ba)004:940: ma grol ba rnams thams cad la //
NK015(ba)004:941: ji tsam dus las bsring ba'o //
NK015(ba)004:943: de bzhin nyid kyis 'chi dang bdud //
NK015(ba)004:944: dgra rnams gzhan las rgyal bar 'gyur //
NK015(ba)004:945: nyes pa ma lus rab tu zhi //
NK015(ba)004:946: yon tan ma lus 'byung ba dang //
NK015(ba)004:947: skyes bu de nyid kyis rgyal zhing //
NK015(ba)004:949: de bzhin nyid ni stong nyid bshad //
NK015(ba)004:950: rnam pa kun mchog bdag nyid can //
NK015(ba)004:951: de nyid rtag tu gom byas na /
NK015(ba)004:955: de dag kyang mdor na tshe zad pa la tshe chog /
NK015(ba)004:957: rlung gi sbyor ba sogs dang /
NK015(ba)004:958: las zad pa la srog bslu nye'u 'don /
NK015(ba)004:959: dka' thub la sogs pa dang /
NK015(ba)004:960: bsod nams zad pa la mchod pa dang sbyin gtong la sogs pas gso zhing /
NK015(ba)004:961: dad pa brtson 'grus bskyed rdzogs kyi nyams len ni thams cad du gal che'o //
NK015(ba)004:964: de bas bsod nams 'bad par bya //
NK015(ba)004:965: dad pas thams cad yang dag 'grub //
NK015(ba)004:966: de bas dad pa rnam par spel //
NK015(ba)004:970: de phyir bsam gtan sems gcig bya /
NK015(ba)004:974: yang dag shes ldan thams cad 'grub //
NK015(ba)004:975: de bas ye shes kun ldan bya //
NK015(ba)004:979: dang po snga 'gyur bka' ma'i phyogs su bdud rtsi
NK015(ba)004:980: 'khyil ba 'chi med tshe'i rgyud sogs rang rkang tshugs
NK015(ba)004:981: pa dang / 'dus mdo'i rtsa rgyud le'u bcu gsum pa nas bshad pa'i tshe dkyil dang /
NK015(ba)004:982: rdzogs chen gyi rgyud rnams nas 'chi bslu gsal rgyas
NK015(ba)004:983: su gsungs pas mtshon zhar byung gi rim pa ji
NK015(ba)004:985: 'dus mdo'i yan lag gi tshe dkyil dang /
NK015(ba)004:986: sgyu 'phrul yan lag sangs rgyas gsang ba'i man ngag
NK015(ba)004:987: tshe dpag med lung lugs su grags pa gnyis la
NK015(ba)004:988: zur pa dang rong zom rog smin gling sku mched
NK015(ba)004:989: sogs kyi yig cha dang dbang lung rgyun ma chad
NK015(ba)004:990: par bzhugs shing / cho ga'i chings lung bdun gyis 'ching bar mdzad de /
NK015(ba)004:991: tshe bca' tshe yi dkyil 'khor dang //
NK015(ba)004:992: tshe yi rang bzhin 'gugs pa dang //
NK015(ba)004:993: tshe bcing tshe yi blan thabs dang //
NK015(ba)004:994: tshe yi dbang bskur bstim pa'o //
NK015(ba)004:997: sangs rgyas gnyis pa pad+ma k+aa ra nyid nges pa'i
NK015(ba)004:998: don du rgyal ba thams cad kyi gsung rdo rje
NK015(ba)004:999: nyid du grub kyang gdul bya gzhan snang du tshe
NK015(ba)004:1000: lam gyi phyag rgya pad+ma can la brten te m+aa
NK015(ba)004:1001: ra ti kar tshe dbang rig 'dzin brnyes pa'i tshul
NK015(ba)004:1002: bstan tshe rgyud bye ba brgya phrag lha mo tsan+d+ha
NK015(ba)004:1003: l+ais phul zhing tshe dpag med kyis gnang ba bstsal
NK015(ba)004:1004: ba la brten tshe'i rig 'dzin sgrub pa'i thabs dpag
NK015(ba)004:1005: tu med par mdzad de 'phags bod la sogs par
NK015(ba)004:1007: ma 'ongs pa'i gdul bya la dgongs nas phyogs bzhi dbus lnga'i gter du btsas pa rnams /
NK015(ba)004:1008: sku gsum rigs 'dus snga phyi gsum nyang dang sangs gling byang bdag gsum gyis phyung zhing /
NK015(ba)004:1009: rata gling dang pad gling gis rdo rje phreng ba
NK015(ba)004:1010: phyung bas mtshon gter ston re res kyang tshe sgrub
NK015(ba)004:1011: kyi gdams pa 'dra min mang du bton pa'i rgyud
NK015(ba)004:1012: dang gdams pa'i rnam grangs brjod par mi langs kyang
NK015(ba)004:1013: / ngo bo'i sgo nas bsdu na /
NK015(ba)004:1014: gtso sgrub bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag med dang /
NK015(ba)004:1015: thugs rje chen po yab yum /
NK015(ba)004:1016: bla ma longs sku dang sprul sku'i sgrub thabs rnams su ci rigs par 'du zhing /
NK015(ba)004:1017: zhar las byung ba rtsa gsum so so'i las mtha' rgyas ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
NK015(ba)004:1018: de dag re re la'ang bdag mdun bum pa sgrub pa /
NK015(ba)004:1025: nam mkha' zas za sogs la brten nas tshe bsring
NK015(ba)004:1026: ba'i thabs sna re res kyang dgos pa 'grub pa'i
NK015(ba)004:1027: gdams ngag gi dbye bsdu dang /
NK015(ba)004:1028: bder 'dus las tshe lung lngar bshad pas mtshon cho
NK015(ba)004:1029: ga'i chings kyi bye brag ni smos kyi mi langs
NK015(ba)004:1030: so // dag snang gi phyogs la /
NK015(ba)004:1031: o rgyan chen pos dngos su bstsal ba ras chen
NK015(ba)004:1032: dpal 'byor bzang po'i tshe sgrub mda' 'phel mar grags
NK015(ba)004:1033: pa ngo mtshar mngon sum bskyed pa dang /
NK015(ba)004:1034: grub chen thang stong rgyal po'i 'chi med dpal ster
NK015(ba)004:1035: zhes byin rlabs tshan kha mchog tu che ba dang
NK015(ba)004:1036: / 'bri gung chos kyi grags pa'i sgra mi snyan
NK015(ba)004:1037: gyi tshe sgrub dbang gzhung las kha tshar bcas pa
NK015(ba)004:1038: / dang / snang gsal ba bkra shis rgya mtsho'i h+r+aihgaciga ma zhes zab cing rgya che ba dang /
NK015(ba)004:1039: khrag 'thung nam mkha' 'jigs med kyi dag snang rig
NK015(ba)004:1040: 'dzin srog sgrub las 'byung ba'i tshe sgrub bskyed rdzogs
NK015(ba)004:1041: shin tu zab pa sogs yongs su grags pa dang
NK015(ba)004:1042: ma grags pa shin tu mang ste so so'ang dbang
NK015(ba)004:1043: bskur bsnyen sgrub las kha tshar dang bcas pa'o //
NK015(ba)004:1044: rlung gi rnal 'byor gtso bor bstan cing bcud len gyi sgo nas /
NK015(ba)004:1045: rdo rje'i tshe sgrub pa la mchog tu zab cing
NK015(ba)004:1046: yongs su grags pa ni slob dpon chen po'i sgyu
NK015(ba)004:1047: 'phrul gyi bkod pa grub chen dza h+aa b+hir gyi
NK015(ba)004:1048: gdams pa b+h+r+aum rlung rigs gsum ste /
NK015(ba)004:1049: bka' bab dang po dzo gi badz+ra n+aa thas chos rgyal rin chen phun tshogs la bstsal ba dang /
NK015(ba)004:1050: bar pa ma ni k+aa n+aa thas 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug la gnang ba dang /
NK015(ba)004:1051: phyi ma grub chen nyi zla klong gsal la dag
NK015(ba)004:1052: pa'i snang bar dza b+hir nyid kyis dngos su gnang
NK015(ba)004:1053: ba ste snga ma gnyis la lung dang khrid kyi
NK015(ba)004:1054: rgyun dang / phyi ma la dbang lung smin khrid
NK015(ba)004:1055: byin rlabs nyams myong grub pa'i rtags mtshan ma chad
NK015(ba)004:1056: rgyun dang / par bzhugs so // gnyis pa phyi
NK015(ba)004:1057: 'gyur gsar ma'i phyogs su tshe'i mdo rgyud rang rkang
NK015(ba)004:1058: rgyun dang / par bzhugs so // tshugs pa ni
NK015(ba)004:1059: / bya rgyud pad+ma'i rigs kyi gtso bo tshe dpag
NK015(ba)004:1061: mchi med rnga sgra'i gzugs gnyis /
NK015(ba)004:1062: gshegs rigs kyi yum gtsug tor rnam rgyal la bde ba can dang /
NK015(ba)004:1064: 'chi bdag dbyug 'dzin bcas gzungs ste gsum du bzhugs la /
NK015(ba)004:1065: gtsug tor dri med kyang tshe spel ba gtso bor gsungs shing /
NK015(ba)004:1066: rgyud sde bzhi kar zhar las 'ongs pa ni mtha' yas so //
NK015(ba)004:1067: de dag la brten pa'i cho ga dang gdams ngag gi skor ni /
NK015(ba)004:1068: rnal 'byor 'phros rgyud ngan song sbyong ba'i brtags pa
NK015(ba)004:1069: nas gsungs pa slob dpon kun dga' snying po'i bka'
NK015(ba)004:1070: srol jo bo rje las brgyud pa phyag na rdo
NK015(ba)004:1071: rje 'chi bdag 'jam dpal lha bcu gsum pa dang
NK015(ba)004:1072: / gsung dkyil tshe dpag med lha bcu gsum gyi dkyil 'khor gnyis /
NK015(ba)004:1073: grub pa'i slob dpon dze t+aa ris bkral ba mtshan
NK015(ba)004:1074: brgya rtsa brgyad pa'i gzungs la brten pa'i tshe dpag
NK015(ba)004:1076: rnga sgra'i gzungs la brten pa'i lha bco lnga'i dkyil 'khor gnyis /
NK015(ba)004:1077: 'gro ba'i me long gis bya btus su bshad pa
NK015(ba)004:1078: gtsug tor rnam rgyal lha so gsum ma'i dkyil 'khor
NK015(ba)004:1079: dang / mi tra'i rdor phreng du'ang lha dgu'i dkyil 'khor bzhugs shing /
NK015(ba)004:1080: bde ba can gyi gtsug tor rnam rgyal gzungs la
NK015(ba)004:1081: brten pa rnam rgyal lha dgu ba ri lugs te
NK015(ba)004:1082: snga ma rnams dbang dang phyi ma rjes gnang gi
NK015(ba)004:1083: rgyun la brten sgrub mchod stod dbang bsnyen sgrub 'chi
NK015(ba)004:1084: bslu sogs kyis 'gro ba mtha' yas pa dus min
NK015(ba)004:1085: 'chi las skyob cing gnas skabs mthar thug gi dngos
NK015(ba)004:1086: grub stsol ba grub mtha' yongs la grags so //
NK015(ba)004:1087: gtsug tor dri med lha drug gi rig pa gtad pa'i rgyun /
NK015(ba)004:1088: dkyil 'khor dang srog shing 'dzugs pa s+aats+tsha gdab pa'i cho ga /
NK015(ba)004:1089: 'chi bslu'i yig cha phyag len gyis brgyan pa'i byin
NK015(ba)004:1090: rlabs can zha lu dang ngor lugs la bzhugs shing
NK015(ba)004:1092: bde mchog rtsa rgyud 'bum pa sogs las bstan pa'i
NK015(ba)004:1093: ma rgyud pad+ma gar dbang ngam dpal he ru ka'i
NK015(ba)004:1094: rigs tshe dpag med grub rgyal lugs su grags pa
NK015(ba)004:1095: ni / ma gcig grub pa'i rgyal mos rje btsun
NK015(ba)004:1096: 'ja' tshon gyi sku can ras chung rdo rje grags
NK015(ba)004:1097: pa la dngos su bstsal ba ste /
NK015(ba)004:1098: 'di la phyi sgrub lha tshogs stong dang lnga brgya /
NK015(ba)004:1099: nang sgrub nyis brgya nyer lnga /
NK015(ba)004:1100: gsang sgrub lha bcu gsum ma ste dkyil 'khor dang 'brel ba dang /
NK015(ba)004:1101: gtso rkyang gi sgrub thabs yang gsang lha gcig bum gcig /
NK015(ba)004:1102: tshe dpag med sprul sku'i sgrub thabs /
NK015(ba)004:1103: dkar po phyag bzhi pa sogs mtha' yas pa zhig yod par grags shing /
NK015(ba)004:1104: 'brug lugs zhi ba lha mang dang khro bo lha
NK015(ba)004:1105: mang gi dbang lung rgyun gtso rkyang gsum gyi rjes
NK015(ba)004:1106: gnang sogs dang / khyad par lha gcig bum gcig ni grub mtha' yongs la grags shing /
NK015(ba)004:1107: shin tu khyab che bas ras chung pa'i gdams ngag
NK015(ba)004:1108: sham bu can bco brgyad kyi nang gses tshe dpag
NK015(ba)004:1109: med 'gro don gyi sham bu can du bzhed cing
NK015(ba)004:1110: / 'di la 'ba' ra ba'i snyan brgyud bskyed bzlas
NK015(ba)004:1111: kyi rim pa la brten nas tshe bcud bsdu ba
NK015(ba)004:1112: / / rtsa rlung thig le la brten pa'i rdzogs
NK015(ba)004:1113: rim ste man ngag khyad par can gyi tshe khrid
NK015(ba)004:1114: mtha' rgyas bcud len gyi las tshogs dang bcas pa
NK015(ba)004:1115: grub pa'i mtshan rtags ma chad par bzhugs so //
NK015(ba)004:1116: gzhan yang ngan song sbyong rgyud la brten pa a
NK015(ba)004:1117: b+ha le'i gdams ngag ba ri lugs kyi tshe dpag
NK015(ba)004:1119: gzungs las gsungs pa'i tshe dpag med dkar po grub
NK015(ba)004:1120: chen mi tra dzo kii'i bzhed srol cha lo nas
NK015(ba)004:1121: brgyud pa tshar lugs dkar po lha gsum du 'dren
NK015(ba)004:1122: pa dang / bcangs pa tsam gyis skye ba dran
NK015(ba)004:1123: pa bslab btus nas bshad pa'i lus srung ba'i rig
NK015(ba)004:1124: sngags dang tshul gcig pa lha'i dge bsnyen gyis byang
NK015(ba)004:1125: gling nas blangs te dgra bcom pa blo gros dpal
NK015(ba)004:1126: la gtad pa sgra mi snyan gyi tshe'i ra nga
NK015(ba)004:1127: gzungs su grags pa la rang lus lcags kyi rdo
NK015(ba)004:1128: rjer bsgom zhing gzungs sngags bzla ba gtad lung gi
NK015(ba)004:1130: sh+aaka thub bsgoms bzlas yod pa'i sgom lung phog pa dang /
NK015(ba)004:1131: tshe dpag med lhung bzed bsnams pa'i mngon rtogs dang
NK015(ba)004:1132: 'brel ba tshe dbang sgrub thabs bcas pan chen nags
NK015(ba)004:1133: rin nas brgyud pa bcas lugs dang /
NK015(ba)004:1134: rdo rje gdan pa'i thugs dam lha drug gi ya gyal thub pa me ru shi sha dang /
NK015(ba)004:1135: sh+aakya rak+shi ta'i man ngag rnam rgyal ma phyag gnyis
NK015(ba)004:1136: la sogs pa gtso rkyang gi rigs ni mang du
NK015(ba)004:1137: 'byung ngo // bod snga ma rnams sgrol ma ral
NK015(ba)004:1138: pa gyen bardzesa kyi rgyud sogs la brten pa'i bya
NK015(ba)004:1139: rgyud pad+ma'i rigs kyi yum du bzhed cing /
NK015(ba)004:1140: thams cad mkhyen pa sgrol ba'i mgon pos sgrol ma
NK015(ba)004:1141: bla med kyi shing rta gsar du drangs pa nas
NK015(ba)004:1142: khungs chod de mngon 'byung gi rgyud la brten par
NK015(ba)004:1143: bzhed pa / slob dpon ngag gi dbang phyug grags
NK015(ba)004:1144: pas mdzad pa'i 'chi bdag bslu ba'i rtogs pa las
NK015(ba)004:1145: byung ba sgrol dkar yid bzhin 'khor lo la bod
NK015(ba)004:1146: du bka' bab bzhi'am drug tu bzhed pa'i dang po
NK015(ba)004:1147: jo bo lugs la sgrub thabs las tshogs tshe khrid
NK015(ba)004:1148: dang bcas pa byin rlabs dang grub pa'i mtshan ma
NK015(ba)004:1149: ma chad pa khyad 'phags su bzhugs /
NK015(ba)004:1150: gnyis pa ba ri lugs la sgrol dkar 'od zer
NK015(ba)004:1151: drug sbrags su grags pa'i rjes gnang thun mong ma
NK015(ba)004:1152: yin pa dang / tshar chen chos kyi rgyal pos
NK015(ba)004:1153: mdzad pa'i tshe khrid zla ba'i chu rgyun ltar khrid
NK015(ba)004:1154: yin pa dang / rgyun smin rgyas / las tshogs ches mang ba dang bcas pa /
NK015(ba)004:1156: bzhi pa pan chen nags rin lugs bcas yongs su grags shing /
NK015(ba)004:1157: ngag dbang grags pas mar pa dang des rngog chos
NK015(ba)004:1158: sku rdo rje la gnang ba'i rngog lugs te lnga
NK015(ba)004:1159: bod 'chi bslu'i rgya gzhung kho na la brten par
NK015(ba)004:1160: grags / bka' bab drug pa sgar lugs ni rje
NK015(ba)004:1161: rol pa'i rdo rje la rje btsun sgrol mas dngos
NK015(ba)004:1162: su bstsal ba'i nye brgyud de bdag bskyed sgrol dkar
NK015(ba)004:1164: mdun bskyed tshe dpag med grub rgyal lugs dang mtshungs pa'i bzlas sgom can no //
NK015(ba)004:1165: gzhan yang a b+ha ya'i lugs lo ts+aa ba grags pa rgyal mtshan nas brgyud pa dang /
NK015(ba)004:1166: rdo rje gdan pa nish+k+aa lam ka nas dpal rgyal chos kyi bzang po la brgyud pa dang /
NK015(ba)004:1167: kha che pan chen lugs sgrol dkar lha dgu ma dang /
NK015(ba)004:1168: slob dpon yid bzhin nor bu sbyin pa'i lugs 'chi
NK015(ba)004:1169: med 'phags ma sgrol ma bcas thams cad kyang rjes
NK015(ba)004:1170: gnang sngon du 'gro ba'i bskyed rim yan lag bzhi
NK015(ba)004:1171: ldan bzlas pa spro bsdu dang bcas pas tshe bsring
NK015(ba)004:1172: ba dang / khyad par jo bo lugs la bskyed bzlas gnyis la nang gses bzhi /
NK015(ba)004:1173: mtshan bcas kyi rdzogs rim gnyis /
NK015(ba)004:1174: mtshan med gcig bcas kyis tshe bsring ba dang /
NK015(ba)004:1175: ba ri lugs la bskyed rim gyi khyad par dmigs gnad 'khor lo gsal gdab /
NK015(ba)004:1179: sngags bzlas lnga'i sgo nas tshe bsring ba yin no //
NK015(ba)004:1180: sgrol dkar yid bzhin 'khor lo'i las tshogs ma dag
NK015(ba)004:1181: ni mang mkhar ba blo gros bzang pos phyogs gcig
NK015(ba)004:1182: tu bsgrigs pa sgrol dkar chen mar grags pa'i be
NK015(ba)004:1183: bum du gsal zhing khungs dang ldan pa'o //
NK015(ba)004:1184: rgyud gdan bzhi nas sgrol dkar gyi 'khor lo gsungs pa dang /
NK015(ba)004:1185: tshe dpag med grub rgyal lugs kyis mtshon bla med
NK015(ba)004:1186: nas kyang tshe sgrub pa'i lha sngags dngos dang brgyud
NK015(ba)004:1187: nas ji snyed cig bstan la /
NK015(ba)004:1189: bde mchog bshad rgyud a b+hi d+ha na las bstan
NK015(ba)004:1190: pa 'chi med rdo rje lha mo zhes pa dpal
NK015(ba)004:1191: ldan sa skya'i gser chos bcu gsum nang tshan shin
NK015(ba)004:1194: 'di ni khri tsam bzlas byas na /
NK015(ba)004:1199: / 'chi ba la ni nges par slong //
NK015(ba)004:1200: zhes pa ltar phan yon mchog dang ldan pa dang /
NK015(ba)004:1202: dus min 'chi ba slu ba la //
NK015(ba)004:1203: yan lag kha t+w+aam dag dang sbyar //
NK015(ba)004:1204: thod pa'i mchod yon snod du ni //
NK015(ba)004:1205: zhal du mtshan ma nges par sbyar //
NK015(ba)004:1206: zhes pa'i bstan don la kha t+w+aam ka dang thod sbyor gyi dmigs pa tsam dang /
NK015(ba)004:1207: dpal ldan 'brug pa'i man ngag sogs kyang 'byung mod
NK015(ba)004:1208: kyi gtso bor kha che pan chen gyi khyad 'phags
NK015(ba)004:1209: lha bzhi'i ya gyal bde mchog dkar po'i tshe sgrub
NK015(ba)004:1210: la tshar lugs kyi bskyed rdzogs khrid dang bcas pa'ang
NK015(ba)004:1211: byung la tshe sgrub pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor gyi gtso
NK015(ba)004:1212: bo ni de tsam zhar las 'ongs pa ni mang
NK015(ba)004:1213: ngo // nad zhi mdzad sman gyi bla dang sangs rgyas spyan ma /
NK015(ba)004:1214: rmi lam ngan pa zlog pa spyan ras gzigs yi ge phyed dang bzhi pa /
NK015(ba)004:1215: sa 'og gdon 'joms seng ge sgra dang ye shes khyung khra /
NK015(ba)004:1216: 'jigs pa bcu drug las skyob pa sgrol ma ljang gu dang sna tshogs yum /
NK015(ba)004:1217: grib gdon gnyen po rnam 'joms dang sme ba brtsegs pa /
NK015(ba)004:1218: byad kha zlog byed gdugs dkar mo dang seng gdong
NK015(ba)004:1219: ma la sogs pa rnams kyang ring du 'tsho ba'i
NK015(ba)004:1220: cho ga'i yan lag tu 'gyur ro //
NK015(ba)004:1221: sngags gsar rnying las bcud len gyi gzhung gdams ngag mtha' yas pa gsungs mod /
NK015(ba)004:1222: dus kyi dbang gis ji bzhin pa sgrub pa dkon zhing 'grub dka' yang /
NK015(ba)004:1223: bka' ma lo chen bee ro'i lugs dang /
NK015(ba)004:1224: rgya ban rdo rje 'od kyi rtag ngu'i bcud len dang /
NK015(ba)004:1225: byang gter sogs kyi bka' srol /
NK015(ba)004:1226: gsar ma'i gdams ngag ci rigs las phyag rgyun ma
NK015(ba)004:1227: chad pa tsam bzhugs shing nus pa thon pa'ang mtha'
NK015(ba)004:1229: grub chen o rgyan pa'i lugs kyi dngul chu btso bkru chen mo /
NK015(ba)004:1230: rin chen tsha grang sbyor ba'i phyag len shin tu
NK015(ba)004:1231: khungs btsun zur mkhar khu dbon dang kun mkhyen bstan
NK015(ba)004:1232: pa'i nyin byed las brgyud de rkang gnyis lus srog
NK015(ba)004:1233: 'tsho ba'i bcud len khyad 'phags su sbyor ba'i rgyun
NK015(ba)004:1236: cho ga de rnams ring 'tsho'i bya ba dang ji ltar 'brel ba /
NK015(ba)004:1241: spyir lhag pa'i lha rnams la thugs rje dang nus pa tshad med pa mnga' zhing /
NK015(ba)004:1242: sgos dmigs bsal du smos pa de rnams thugs bskyed
NK015(ba)004:1243: dang smon lam gyi khyad par las 'gro ba gang
NK015(ba)004:1244: zhig tshe yis phongs pa la tshe stsol zhing /
NK015(ba)004:1245: dus ma yin par 'chi ba las skyob pa'i phrin
NK015(ba)004:1246: las khyad par can mnga' bas sgom zhing bzlas pa
NK015(ba)004:1247: lta ci smos / gsol ba 'debs pa tsam gyis
NK015(ba)004:1248: kyang gnas skabs dang mthar thug gi 'dod pa'i 'bras
NK015(ba)004:1252: nga rgyal brtan par gyur pa las //
NK015(ba)004:1253: yid bzhin nor ltar ma lus pa'i /
NK015(ba)004:1255: / 'dod pa'i don ni rab sgrub byed //
NK015(ba)004:1258: dper na phyi rol gyi khang pa la skyon med na nang gi ka ba brtan cing /
NK015(ba)004:1259: ka ba brtan pas khang pa mi 'jigs pa gcig la gcig ltos pa bzhin /
NK015(ba)004:1260: lus srog phan tshun du ltos pas srog gnas pa'ang lus la rag las shing /
NK015(ba)004:1261: lus kyi 'tsho ba srog la ltos pa ste /
NK015(ba)004:1262: lus ni rgyud dang gso dpyad sogs las zhib par
NK015(ba)004:1263: 'byung ba bzhin dang po 'byung bzhi'i dwangs ma 'dus
NK015(ba)004:1264: pa las skyes / bar du 'byung ba bzhi gcig grogs gcig gis byas te gnas /
NK015(ba)004:1265: tha mar gcig gshed gcig gis byas te srog 'dor ba phyi snod kyi chags 'jig dang mtshungs shing /
NK015(ba)004:1266: 'byung bzhi 'khrugs pa'i rgyu dug gsum dang rkyen zas spyod ma snyoms pas byed cing /
NK015(ba)004:1267: de las dwangs ma zad cing snyigs ma 'phel ba'i rtags lus la shar ba ste /
NK015(ba)004:1268: sa'i dwangs ma nyams pas sha skams /
NK015(ba)004:1277: nam mkha'i dwangs ma nyams pas brjed nges che /
NK015(ba)004:1279: de las dbang po rnams kyang 'grib ste /
NK015(ba)004:1280: yul dang dbang po srog rnams ni /
NK015(ba)004:1283: zhes pa de 'byung ba yin la /
NK015(ba)004:1284: rnam rtog gzhan du mi g.yo bas lha bsgom pa dang /
NK015(ba)004:1285: ngag dang 'gog pa sogs bzlas pa'i bye brag la
NK015(ba)004:1286: rtse gcig tu brtson pas sems kyi bcud ma zag
NK015(ba)004:1287: pas lus kyi dwangs ma stobs rgyas te srog mi
NK015(ba)004:1289: phung khams lha la sogs par snang ba la dus
NK015(ba)004:1290: kyi zhags pas kyang 'ching bar 'os pa ma yin
NK015(ba)004:1291: pa dang / lus ngag yid gsum shin tu sbyangs
NK015(ba)004:1292: pas srog ye shes kyi char ji tsam bkag pa
NK015(ba)004:1293: de tsam dus kyi chad pa las ring du bsring
NK015(ba)004:1295: phyi nang rten 'brel gyi 'gros gcig cing snang ba
NK015(ba)004:1296: sems kyi rang gzugs yin pa'i dbang las tshe bcud
NK015(ba)004:1297: bsdu bstim gyi 'phro 'dus nang gi 'byung bzhi'i dwangs
NK015(ba)004:1298: ma stobs su gyur pa las gong du smros pa'i
NK015(ba)004:1299: nyes pa thams cad zad cing de las ldog pa'i
NK015(ba)004:1300: yon tan rnams skyed pa'i phyir /
NK015(ba)004:1301: lus nad gnyen po bdag nyid gcig par 'brel //
NK015(ba)004:1302: zhes pa ltar cho ga byas pas lus srog 'tsho
NK015(ba)004:1303: ba'i 'brel ni de la sogs pa mang mod kyi
NK015(ba)004:1304: mdor bsdus so // gnyis pa ni /
NK015(ba)004:1305: dpyod ldan kha cig gis snod dang bcud kyi tshe
NK015(ba)004:1306: bcud de dngos su bsdu ba yod na bsdu gzhi
NK015(ba)004:1307: la gnod cing / med na bsdu yul la mi phan pa'i dogs slong mdzad do //
NK015(ba)004:1308: des ni yang na dmigs pa'i 'khrul 'khor thams cad don med du 'gyur bas sngags mi 'grub la /
NK015(ba)004:1309: yang na sngags grub kyang spyod pa phyin ci log
NK015(ba)004:1310: tu song bas thar pa dang 'gal ba sogs the
NK015(ba)004:1311: tshom du ma slong ba'i phyir gsang sngags la the
NK015(ba)004:1312: tshom za ba'i rigs par song bas rtog ge ba'i
NK015(ba)004:1314: log pa'i lam la mtha' med phyir //
NK015(ba)004:1315: de dag 'dir ni spro bya min //
NK015(ba)004:1317: de lta na zhi sogs kyi las la'ang dpyad pa 'jug la /
NK015(ba)004:1318: de'ang dpyad na thug med du 'gyur bas sngags kyi las rab 'byams 'gog dgos par 'gyur la /
NK015(ba)004:1320: thams mang dka' ba med pa sogs kyi sgrub byed kyang don med du 'gyur ba dang /
NK015(ba)004:1321: gzhan yang 'phags pa rnams kyi byin rlabs bsdu ba de'ang dngos su bsdur yod dam med /
NK015(ba)004:1322: med na rang la byin gyis rlob par mi 'gyur la /
NK015(ba)004:1323: yod na 'phags pa la gnod par 'gyur ro //
NK015(ba)004:1324: dngos su bsdur med kyang mos pa'i mthu las byin
NK015(ba)004:1325: gyis rlob par 'gyur na 'byung bcud sogs la'ang rigs
NK015(ba)004:1326: pa mtshungs shing / yod kyang 'phags la gnod par
NK015(ba)004:1327: mi 'gyur te gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab bo
NK015(ba)004:1328: pa mtshungs shing / zhe na / sems can gyis
NK015(ba)004:1329: las snang yang bsam gyis mi khyab pas na de
NK015(ba)004:1331: gcig shos phan pas gcig shos la gnod pa kho na'ang ma nges te /
NK015(ba)004:1332: rgya mtsho las char byung bas lo tog la phan kyang rgya mtsho la mi gnod pa bzhin no //
NK015(ba)004:1333: dper na nor bu shin tu sbyangs pa la gsol ba btab pas 'dod pa nyid 'jo yang /
NK015(ba)004:1334: dngos po de dag gzhan las 'phrog pa'ang med cing
NK015(ba)004:1335: nor bu rang gi ngo bo'am gzhan la'ang gnod pa
NK015(ba)004:1336: med par rten 'brel gyi nus pas byed po rang
NK015(ba)004:1337: nyid la phan btags pa bzhin du /
NK015(ba)004:1338: sngags dang ting nge 'dzin gyi mthu ni bsam gyis
NK015(ba)004:1339: mi khyab pas mos pa'i mthu las grub pa sbyin
NK015(ba)004:1340: pa ste / ngag dbang grags pas /
NK015(ba)004:1341: 'jig rten na ni dngos gzhan gang //
NK015(ba)004:1342: sngags kyis mi 'grub de yod min //
NK015(ba)004:1343: yang dag dad pas 'bad pa la //
NK015(ba)004:1344: sngags rnams yid bzhin nor bur mtshungs //
NK015(ba)004:1346: des na rtog ge'i rig pas chos nyid dang sngags
NK015(ba)004:1347: kyi tshul la gzhal na blo chung mang po ngan
NK015(ba)004:1348: 'gro'i g.yang sar 'phen pa las dgos nus gzhan ma
NK015(ba)004:1349: mchis pas / bzod pa dang mngon shes ma thob
NK015(ba)004:1350: pa dag gis mos pa brtan pos bsgrub par bya
NK015(ba)004:1353: chos nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i //
NK015(ba)004:1354: don la the tshom med pa yi //
NK015(ba)004:1355: mkhas pa la ni dngos grub nye //
NK015(ba)004:1356: yang na blun po dad pa brtan //
NK015(ba)004:1357: de la sbyor ba'i dngos grub nye //
NK015(ba)004:1358: rtog cing dpyad pa'i rtog ge ba //
NK015(ba)004:1359: de la dngos grub ring du bskal //
NK015(ba)004:1360: zhes ljags byang bar klog bzhin pas so //
NK015(ba)004:1361: bcu pa thabs de rnams kyis 'chi ba slu zhing ring du 'tsho ba'i shes byed la gnyis /
NK015(ba)004:1370: sems can thams cad ni zas kyis gnas pa'o //
NK015(ba)004:1373: ngal dang smin dang btung sogs kyis //
NK015(ba)004:1374: pho ba'i me ni 'bar gyur la //
NK015(ba)004:1375: me ni rab tu 'bar bas zas //
NK015(ba)004:1376: yongs 'jug par yang nus pa yin //
NK015(ba)004:1377: yongs su zhu bas lus rgyas shing //
NK015(ba)004:1378: rgyas pas stobs ni rnam par 'phel //
NK015(ba)004:1381: kun gyis mngon sum grub 'di la //
NK015(ba)004:1382: the tshom yod min ji lta ba //
NK015(ba)004:1383: de ltar man ngag las bskal sogs /
NK015(ba)004:1385: / 'tsho ba yang ni the tshom med //
NK015(ba)004:1386: ces pa ltar zas dang ldan pas srog 'tsho la
NK015(ba)004:1387: mi ldan na 'tsho mi nus pa bzhin 'tsho ba
NK015(ba)004:1388: nyid thabs kyi rgyu rkyen la rags las pa yin
NK015(ba)004:1391: snum dang snying po zad sogs las //
NK015(ba)004:1392: mar me la sogs 'jig phyogs pa'ang //
NK015(ba)004:1393: slar yang snum sogs rab thob pas //
NK015(ba)004:1394: bskal pa'i bar du gnas pa yin //
NK015(ba)004:1395: ji ltar de bzhin lus 'di yang //
NK015(ba)004:1396: rgas sogs kyis ni 'chi bzhin par //
NK015(ba)004:1397: grub pa'i man ngag legs rnyed na //
NK015(ba)004:1398: bskal pa'i mthar yang cis mi gnas //
NK015(ba)004:1399: dper na khang pa rnying pa dag /
NK015(ba)004:1400: bcos pa yis ni yun ring gnas //
NK015(ba)004:1401: de bzhin rnying pa'i lus dag kyang //
NK015(ba)004:1402: bcos pas gnas pa cis mi 'gyur //
NK015(ba)004:1403: zhes gsungs pa ltar tshe sring ba'i thabs la mkhas
NK015(ba)004:1404: shing rtsol ba dang ldan na ring du 'tsho ba
NK015(ba)004:1405: la dka' ba yod pa ma yin no //
NK015(ba)004:1407: mngon pa las srog ni mtha' gcig tu las kyi
NK015(ba)004:1408: rnam par smin pa kho na yin pa'i shes byed
NK015(ba)004:1409: dgra bcom pa dus mi sbyor bas gang zag khyad
NK015(ba)004:1410: par can nam dge 'dun la 'tsho chas phul nas
NK015(ba)004:1411: 'dun pa drag pos rab mtha'i bsam gtan la snyoms
NK015(ba)004:1412: par bzhugs shing / de las langs te bdag gi
NK015(ba)004:1413: longs spyod kyi rnam par smin pa gang yin pa
NK015(ba)004:1414: de tsho'i rnam par smin par gyur cig snyam pa'i
NK015(ba)004:1415: dge rtsa dang rnam rig dag gi mthus rnam smin
NK015(ba)004:1416: gyi tshe 'jog par bshad pas bsod nams gsog pa
NK015(ba)004:1417: de yongs su bsngosa pas tshe 'phel bar grub ste
NK015(ba)004:1418: par bzhugs shing / / srog bslu ba sogs 'bras bu'i rgyu mthun pa yin pa'i phyir dang /
NK015(ba)004:1419: de nyid kyang myong bar ma nges pa'i las su
NK015(ba)004:1420: mi 'gyur te gzhi bsam sbyor ba mthar thug tshang
NK015(ba)004:1421: zhing las kyi 'phen pa'i rgyun 'thud par byed pa'i
NK015(ba)004:1422: phyir chu rka gsos pas yur chu'i rgyun 'thud pa
NK015(ba)004:1423: bzhin no // des na mdo las /
NK015(ba)004:1424: srog ni rnam par smin pa yin gyi 'das pa'i
NK015(ba)004:1425: las kho na'i ni ma yin no zhes pas tshe'i
NK015(ba)004:1426: las mthong chos kyi 'bras bu can du bzhed do
NK015(ba)004:1429: las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs so //
NK015(ba)004:1431: rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las /
NK015(ba)004:1432: mdo sdes ni las kyi rnam par smin pa mi
NK015(ba)004:1433: zlog la sngags kyis zlog pas khyad par 'phags so
NK015(ba)004:1434: zhes gsungs pa ltar sngags kyi dkyil 'khor zab mo
NK015(ba)004:1436: gsang sngags sogs la brtson pas las kyi rnam smin
NK015(ba)004:1437: kyang byang zhing srab par nus na 'phral gyi bar
NK015(ba)004:1438: chad tsam sel ba ni lta ci smos shing /
NK015(ba)004:1439: khyad par sku gsung thugs 'chi med rdo rjer bsgrub pa'i sbyang gzhi gdos bcas kyi lus dang /
NK015(ba)004:1441: gzung 'dzin gyi rnam rtog la yod cing /
NK015(ba)004:1442: de gsum gyi gnad rtsa rlung thig le gsum la yod pas /
NK015(ba)004:1443: rtsa skam 'chus dri can sogs su gyur ba dang /
NK015(ba)004:1444: rlung zla nyi rang dbang du bgrod pas dbu ma'i longs spyod 'phrog pa dang /
NK015(ba)004:1445: thig le dkar po thur dang dmar po gyen du
NK015(ba)004:1446: phyogs te skyon du gyur pa las ni nad dang
NK015(ba)004:1447: rgas pa dang / 'chi ba'i nyes pa skyed cing /
NK015(ba)004:1448: rnal 'byor gyi stobs kyis rtsa dbu ma /
NK015(ba)004:1450: thig le 'du 'phrod la gnad du bsnun pas /
NK015(ba)004:1451: bgrod pa gnyis po dbu ma'i longs spyod du gyur cing dpyid thig gong bur bcings /
NK015(ba)004:1452: grub pa'i dngul chus lcags 'bigs pa ltar lus ngag
NK015(ba)004:1453: yid gsum rdo rje gsum du sgyur bas rtsa thig
NK015(ba)004:1454: rlung gi rnal 'byor 'chi med 'grub pa gdams ngag
NK015(ba)004:1455: gsang lam yin pa'i rgyu mtshan de lta bu dang
NK015(ba)004:1456: / 'chi ba bslu ba la rlung gi rnal 'byor
NK015(ba)004:1457: lhag par zab pa'i gnad gsang rang byung rgyal bas
NK015(ba)004:1461: las rlung dang ye rlung gnyis kyi ye shes rlung
NK015(ba)004:1462: la cha gnyis su phye ba'i gcig gis nang du
NK015(ba)004:1463: srog rlung gi nus pa bskyed cing /
NK015(ba)004:1464: cha gcig las rlung dang 'dres pa'i tshul gyis nyin
NK015(ba)004:1465: zhag rer drug brgya bdun cu rtsa lnga phyi rol
NK015(ba)004:1466: du rgyu ba de nyid 'phel na srog gi nus
NK015(ba)004:1468: zla nyi dag kyang yon por rgyus nas 'chi ba
NK015(ba)004:1469: skyed la bum can sogs kyis nang du bzung bas
NK015(ba)004:1470: ye rlung 'phel zhing ring du song bas las rlung
NK015(ba)004:1471: dag ste rdo rje'i sku 'grub pa dang /
NK015(ba)004:1472: kun rdzob kyi thig le ni chags pa'i 'pho ba
NK015(ba)004:1473: can yin la ji tsam 'phos pa de tsam du
NK015(ba)004:1474: tshe'i 'du byed bstungs shing chags bral 'pho med du
NK015(ba)004:1475: bzhu btul byas pas dwangs ma stobs su gyur te
NK015(ba)004:1476: don dam byang chub kyi sems brtan pas 'chi med
NK015(ba)004:1477: ye shes kyi sku 'grub pa sogs rgyu mtshan shin
NK015(ba)004:1478: tu mang mod kyis rgyas par ma spros la /
NK015(ba)004:1479: gong du smos pa rnams kyi zhar las kyang rtogs nus so //
NK015(ba)004:1481: 'tsho thabs kyi cho ga de rnams shes pa kho nas phan pa ma mchis shing /
NK015(ba)004:1482: sang bya gnang bya'ang mi tshe 'dzad pa'i rgyu yin pas 'phral la nyams su blang dgos te /
NK015(ba)004:1485: shin tu mang po shes nas kyang //
NK015(ba)004:1486: nyams ma blangs na mal du ni //
NK015(ba)004:1489: rnal 'byor gyi ni bstan bcos dang //
NK015(ba)004:1490: sbyor ba du ma shes nas kyang //
NK015(ba)004:1491: deng ngam sang ni bya'o zhes //
NK015(ba)004:1492: sems bzhin du ni pha rol 'chi //
NK015(ba)004:1494: gang zhig 'bad na 'jig rten na mi 'grub pa'i
NK015(ba)004:1495: dngos po ni 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin pas
NK015(ba)004:1498: stobs kyis 'bad pas dka' ba cung zad med //
NK015(ba)004:1499: de bas rtsol ba'i khur ni 'dor mi bya //
NK015(ba)004:1500: rtag tu 'bab na chu rgyun 'jam pos kyang //
NK015(ba)004:1501: dus su rdo le ba dag kyang rnam par 'big /
NK015(ba)004:1502: gtsubs na shing las me ni 'byung 'gyur zhing //
NK015(ba)004:1503: brkos par 'gyur na sa la chu 'byung 'gyur //
NK015(ba)004:1504: mi yis rtsol ba byas na mi 'grub med //
NK015(ba)004:1507: khyad par shes rab rig pa'i gzhu la thabs mkhas
NK015(ba)004:1508: mad'i 'phrul 'khor sbyar na dka' ba med par gnad
NK015(ba)004:1510: gang phyir rig pa thabs sbyar bas //
NK015(ba)004:1511: dka' ba cung zad yod ma yin //
NK015(ba)004:1512: nor bu sngags dang sman rnams kyi //
NK015(ba)004:1513: mthu ni thams cad yang dag 'dod //
NK015(ba)004:1516: / 'on kyang bskyed sngags lung gi rnams 'byor la sogs
NK015(ba)004:1517: pa ni lan cig tsam dang dus thung ngus 'bras
NK015(ba)004:1518: bu chen po 'grub pa ma yin kyang yang dang
NK015(ba)004:1519: yang du nyams su blangs pas 'dod pa'i don 'grub
NK015(ba)004:1520: par 'gyur te / gus pa la sogs khyad par gyis //
NK015(ba)004:1521: rgyun du bsgom pa gang gang yin /
NK015(ba)004:1523: / 'dod dang mya ngan la sogs pa'i //
NK015(ba)004:1524: blo bzhin de de'i gsal snang 'byung //
NK015(ba)004:1527: de ltar 'tsho ba ring du gnas pa la dgos pa ci yod snyam na /
NK015(ba)004:1528: nor bu zhes pa'i ming dang ldan pa tsam gyis mi chog ste yon tan tshang dgos /
NK015(ba)004:1529: de las 'dod pa 'jo ba bzhin du mtho ris
NK015(ba)004:1530: kyi lus rten thob pa tsam gyis 'dod don mtha'
NK015(ba)004:1531: dag mi 'grub pas mtho ris kyi yon tan dang
NK015(ba)004:1532: ldan dgos / mtho ris kyi yon tan bdun du
NK015(ba)004:1533: grags pa'i gtso bo ni tshe ring ba nyid yin
NK015(ba)004:1534: ldan dgos / la / tshe ring ba la brten
NK015(ba)004:1535: nas 'jig rten gyi lugs dang dam pa'i chos kyi
NK015(ba)004:1536: bya ba ci 'dod pa sgrub nus shing /
NK015(ba)004:1537: de las mthar thug byang chub kyi go 'phang yang
NK015(ba)004:1538: 'grub par 'gyur bas gnas skabs dang mthar thug gi
NK015(ba)004:1539: don chen po dang ldan pa ste /
NK015(ba)004:1541: chos spyod dbang po dul ba ni /
NK015(ba)004:1544: de srid bsod nams la sogs tshogs //
NK015(ba)004:1545: byang chub sgrub byed rab tu skye /
NK015(ba)004:1547: / 'tsho ba las gzhan snying po ni /
NK015(ba)004:1549: / 'khor bar cung zad ma mthong ngo //
NK015(ba)004:1551: bcu gsum pa 'bras bu la gnyis /
NK015(ba)004:1555: rin po che'i nus pas tshe bar bskal sogs su gnas pa klu'i rgyal po lta bu dang /
NK015(ba)004:1556: bcud len gyi nus pas tshe nyi zla dang mnyam
NK015(ba)004:1557: pa slob dpon bya da li pa lta bu dang
NK015(ba)004:1558: / srog gcod spangs pa sogs dkar po rnam par
NK015(ba)004:1559: smin pas tshe lo dpag med nas khri la sogs
NK015(ba)004:1560: pa 'tsho ba lha dang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal
NK015(ba)004:1562: rlung sbyor thun mong ba tsam gyis tshe lo brgya
NK015(ba)004:1563: phrag mang por 'tsho ba ri rab kyi khong gseng
NK015(ba)004:1564: la gnas pa'i drang srong la sogs pa lta bu
NK015(ba)004:1565: 'tsho bas mi phongs shing dpal 'byor chen po la
NK015(ba)004:1566: yun ring du longs spyod nus pa nyid do //
NK015(ba)004:1568: bskyed rim dang bzlas pa mthar phyin pas lhag pa'i
NK015(ba)004:1569: lha yis byin gyis brlabs te ji tsam 'dod kyi
NK015(ba)004:1570: bar du 'tsho ba 'phags pa klu sgrub mi lo
NK015(ba)004:1571: drug brgya bzhugs pas mtshon rgya bod kyi mkhas grub
NK015(ba)004:1572: phal mo che lta bu dang /
NK015(ba)004:1573: rtsa thig rlung gi rnal 'byor gyi dwangs ma stobs
NK015(ba)004:1574: su gyur te 'dod gzugs gang rung gi rig pa
NK015(ba)004:1575: 'dzin pa'i lus su gnas gyur te bskal pa la
NK015(ba)004:1576: sogs par 'tsho zhing bzhugs pa grub chen klu'i byang
NK015(ba)004:1578: bskyed rdzogs cha mnyam du bsgoms pas rags pa'i phung
NK015(ba)004:1579: khams dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lor gnas gyur pa slob
NK015(ba)004:1580: dpon ngag gi dbang phyug lta bu dang /
NK015(ba)004:1581: lus sems kyi 'pho ba mtha' dag zag med 'od
NK015(ba)004:1582: gsal gyi dbyings su sbyangs pas rdo rje'i skus bskal
NK015(ba)004:1583: pa ma stong bar du bzhugs shing gzhan don mdzad
NK015(ba)004:1584: pa sa ra ha dang mi tra dzo ki la
NK015(ba)004:1585: sogs pa bzhin lam legs par sbyangs bas 'chi med
NK015(ba)004:1586: kyi sku 'grub ste don gnyis lhun grub kyi 'khor
NK015(ba)004:1587: los sgyur ba ni rgya bod gnyis su ches mang
NK015(ba)004:1588: po byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid do //
NK015(ba)004:1589: de'ang rtsa thig rlung gsum sku gsung thugs rdo rjer
NK015(ba)004:1590: sbyangs nas ye shes rdo rje'i ngo bor mnyam pa
NK015(ba)004:1591: mthar thug gi 'chi med rnam gsum 'grub par 'gyur
NK015(ba)004:1592: ba ste / sems sgrib bral du dag pas thugs
NK015(ba)004:1593: rdo rje dus gsum mnyam nyid kyi chos sku sems
NK015(ba)004:1594: ba ste / 'chi med dang / ngag sgrib bral
NK015(ba)004:1595: du dag pas gsung rdo rje zab gsal dbyer med
NK015(ba)004:1596: kyi longs skus gzhom med kyi bde bas mkha' khyab
NK015(ba)004:1597: kyi 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa ngag 'chi med dang
NK015(ba)004:1598: ba ste / 'chi med dang / / lus sgrib
NK015(ba)004:1599: bral du dag pas sku rdo rje kun khyab sgyu
NK015(ba)004:1600: 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i sprul skus gang 'dul gyi rol pa
NK015(ba)004:1601: ston pa lus 'chi med de sku dang ye shes
NK015(ba)004:1602: kyi rol pa chen por mngon par rdzogs shing byang
NK015(ba)004:1604: de bas na 'chi med rdo rje'i tshe sgrub pa la nan tan du bya'o //
NK015(ba)004:1605: len pa'i rnam shes kha lo sgyur ba yis //
NK015(ba)004:1606: rig pa'i skyes bu srid 'dir bslus pa la //
NK015(ba)004:1607: thar dang mtho ris bde bar ngal 'tsho ba'i //
NK015(ba)004:1608: rten 'di ring du 'tsho las don chen gang //
NK015(ba)004:1609: spang blang shes shing thabs kyang ma 'gag la //
NK015(ba)004:1610: de blo sbyor ba'i lam la mi 'jug na //
NK015(ba)004:1611: kim pa'i 'bras bzhin dgos dus mi stongs pas //
NK015(ba)004:1612: grogs dag rnam par rigs pa su yis brkus /
NK015(ba)004:1614: / 'tsho thabs nyi zla'i sgron me thogs bzhin du //
NK015(ba)004:1615: da ni btang snyoms mal du mi mnal bar /
NK015(ba)004:1617: / 'chi bdag mun rum bskrad nas sa steng du //
NK015(ba)004:1618: don gnyis snang ba sbar ba'i dus ni 'di //
NK015(ba)004:1619: rgyal bas yid bzhin nor bu'i mchog nyid du //
NK015(ba)004:1620: basngagasa pa'i ljags brkyang lha bas lhag pa'i rten //
NK015(ba)004:1621: cho ga'i mthu las rdo rje'i srog grub ste //
NK015(ba)004:1622: grub gnyis char pas skye dgu 'tsho byed shog /
NK015(ba)004:1623: ces pa 'adi'ang thams cad mkhyen gzigs rdo rje 'dzin
NK015(ba)004:1624: pa 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang po'i zhal snga nas
NK015(ba)004:1625: bka' stsal gnang ba gtsug tu mchod de snyoms las
NK015(ba)004:1626: pa karma ngag dbang yon tan rgya mtshos dpal spungs
NK015(ba)004:1627: yang dben kun bzang bde chen 'od gsal gling du
NK015(ba)004:1628: bris pa dpal ldan bla ma rnams kyi zhabs pad
NK015(ba)004:1630: 'gro ba mtha' yas pa 'chi bdag gi g.yul las rnam par rgyal bar gyur cig //
